Wow is what you'll say when chomping on these nuts.  They're very tasty and addictive, as stated in the other reviews.  If you like wasabi or horseradish, you'll love these.  My mom says almonds help you sleep and for the last week I've slept great.  If you like bold flavor, I strongly recommend them.
I love wasabi....and these almonds are AWESOME!  They taste better than any other "flavor enhanced" almonds on the market.

Regular salted almonds are okay but tend to be boring after awhile.  But Blue Diamond Jalapeno Smokehouse almonds are just amazing.  I could eat an entire can in one sitting no problem, probably two cans.  I was tempted to give these nuts just 1 star because I'm afraid they're going to make me fat and broke!  FYI, I also tried the Wasabi & Soy Sauce almonds--absolutely no comparison, the Jalapeno Smokehouse blow them out of the water (at least to my taste buds).
Tried the almonds today for the first time.  I'm ordering a case right now.  Best ever, ever, ever!!!

These almonds are delicious. When you first start chewing, they taste like the plain Smokehouse brand. After a few seconds the Jalapeno heat kicks in. Not overwhelming but just enough to make the snack wanting you to eat a few more. Only bad part is that they are not available in the 38oz tub or jar like the Habanero BBQ flavor that is a better value. If you like them as I do, you can go through a 6oz can very quickly.

The title says it all.

The wasabi+soy flavors combine to a deliciousness that is out of this world. If you haven't tried them yet, you're missing out.

I became hooked on these tasty tidbits, but after a while, I couldn't find them at my local stores anymore.  I tried Amazon and found I could order them in packs of six.  While the price is a little higher than I'd like, that is overridden by the fact that I can indeed get them, and they are delivered right to my door.  Ordering two packs gives me free shipping, too. These almonds are delicious by themselves, but when mixed with dark chocolate, they become irresistible.  The yummy recipe goes like this: take two almonds and one Hershey's dark chocolate kiss.  Pop the two almonds in your mouth and chew a little. Then pop in the chocolate kiss and chew, mixing the two together.  Sheer bliss!  I've become addicted and don't know what I'd do if these flavored almonds ever become unavailable.

Great flavor. I have always ordered Blue Diamond wasabi almonds but these come in a convenient snack bag I can throw in my purse. My colleagues are always digging around in my purse now because they know I have tasty snacks. So the only drawback is that people want me to share. Which means they are that good! Hey, I should also get a five-star rating for feeding my friends.

These almonds are so yummy! I ordered them online because both of my stores were always out. Walmart and Target is where I get them. I go through these very quickly. I like spicy foods so to me they are not hot but just right.
Wow! These are amazingly tasty! Addictive, even. I only wish they were easier to find!
If you love Salt and Vinegar chips then you can't help but love these almonds, they are sooooooooooooooooooooo good!  Yes, the almonds have fat (much like chips) but at least its a good fat for you!

I love salt & vinegar chips and I love Blue Diamond almonds so I was delighted to find a combination of the two.  They make a great snack and a great substitute for chips with a sandwich.  They are a little tart and a little sweet, YUMMY!
I have tried most of the Blue Diamond Almond flavors and I have to say this one is my FAVORITE!!!  Once I start eating these almonds, it's hard to stop.  YUMMY!!!

Diamond Almonds
Almonds are a good source of magnesium. One ounce contain approximately 20% of the RDA for an adult recommended dietary allowance (RDA)
Recommended Dietary Allowance (RDA) the amounts of selected nutrients considered adequate to meet the known nutrient needs of healthy people. The RDA is based on scientific knowledge and has been presented by a committee of the Food and Nutrition Board (FNB) of the National Academy of Sciences (NAS). The Canadian equivalent is the Recommended Nutrient Intakes. RDA is generally accepted throughout the world as a valid source of information. At least 40 different nations have as well as organizations have published standards similar to the RDA.

Magnesium is the fourth most abundant mineral in the body and is essential to good health. Approximately 50% of total body magnesium is found in bone. The other half is found predominantly inside cells of body tissues and organs. Only 1% of magnesium is found in blood, but the body works very hard to keep blood levels of magnesium constant.
Magnesium is needed for more than 300 biochemical reactions in the body. It helps maintain normal muscle and nerve function, keeps heart rhythm steady, supports a healthy immune system, and keeps bones strong. Magnesium also helps regulate blood sugar levels, promotes normal blood pressure, and is known to be involved in energy metabolism and protein synthesis. There is an increased interest in the role of magnesium in preventing and managing disorders such as hypertension, cardiovascular disease, and diabetes. Dietary magnesium is absorbed in the small intestines. Are you taking enough magnesium in the diet? The recommended daily allowance is 300mgs/day for men, 350mgs for women. Magnesium is extremely safe by mouth - too much simply causes diarrhea. Try increasing the amount of magnesium you take by mouth until it causes diarrhea, then reduce the dose slightly so it does not. This is called taking magnesium to bowel tolerance (just like using vitamin C to bowel tolerance.

Almonds are a good source of Fiber.
One ounce contains approximately 12% of the RDA for an adult.
So, in summary, Almonds are a very healthy snack, so what's left to say?

Two things:
1st be cautious about "bowel tolerance" or "happy bowels" if you prefer.
2nd Taste. I realize that taste is a personal thing. That's why they make chocolate, strawberry, and vanilla.

Here's my current favorites"

1st Blue Diamond Dark mint dark chocolate (reminds me of the chocolate mint Girl Scout Cookies with less sugar).

2nd Blue diamond Dark Chocolate Oven Roasted
3rd Blue diamond Blue Butter Toffee
4thd Blue Diamond Almonds Bold Habanero BBQ (reminds me of BBQ potato chips again with less sugar).
5th Bold Blazin Buffalo Wing
6th Blue Diamond Almonds Cinnamon Brown Sugar
7th Blue Diamond Almonds Lime `n Chili
8th Blue Diamond Almonds Smokehouse
9th Bold Wasabi & Soy Sauce

But that's just me: you might have a completely different take on these flavors.
4th and 5th are very close.

Gunner
May, 2012

These almond flavor by this company brand is simply the best by far.  Great flavor that has the essence of true BBQ taste that is not too spicy.  A great snack whenever and wherever,  you may not be able to eat just one.  to tell the truth,  you might find yourself telling people to keep there hands off your nuts.  yummy!

Lime and Chili seemed a strange combination but the Lime Flavor is natural, not sweet, just tart enough to bring out the chili spice to create a great tasting nut treat to snack on.  Almonds are a great, fun snack and having one that has a Lime Tart Flavor is absolutely Fabulous.  Even better is that Amazon delivers three full one pound packages for less than the price this item normally retails for in Stores, IF you can even get it in your favorite store.
These things are amazing.  I can't eat less than half a can at a sitting.  Probably my favorite snack right now.

Blue Diamond almonds are by far my favorite for flavor and texture. My only minimal complaint about these is that they are very minimally spicy. I was afraid to go for Habenero in case they were TOO spicy, but given that these are much more mild than Jalepenos I will go for Habanero next order.

I would just like to say that this company producing roasted almonds is by far the best tasting almonds I have ever had...they are the perfect most tastiest treat on the go whenever you need one and it is really pleasing to have. Its heart food and I like it. This will be a staple snack for me FOREVER :D if anyone in the company reads this comment, I really encourage you to make a WIDE ARRAY of flavors...it would be very interesting and unique. You guys have A LOT of good ones now..but imagine other possibilities. GO AT IT :D!!!

The Blue Diamond Jalapeno Smokehouse Almonds are great tasting, with a strong smoky flavor and a nice jalapeno bite. These have a decent amount of spicy heat to them, but it isn't too overpowering. My wife picked these up for a long road trip and they were the first snack to get finished up.

Highly Recommended!

CFH

Great BBQ flavor with enough Habanero to give it a nice little kick.  The flavors are not overwhelming, so the taste of the almond still shines through.  A really nice snack that's just a little different.

These Salt and Vinegar Almonds are one of the best snack foods I have ever tasted!  They're just tangy enough to give you a good kick.  Hard to find in my local stores, so I came to Amazon and bought a case  :-)

I like lime and I like chili so I figured this would be a pretty tasty nut. It is definitely very flavorful but the lime overpowers the chili so much that the chili might as well be nonexistent. So if you are a lime lover you will probably enjoy this flavor, otherwise you might want to try one of the other varieties instead.  Personally I will finish up this batch but once they're gone I will go back to my habanero bbq and wasabi.

These are the best snack food ever! Spicy AND healthy. The 100-calorie packs are a blessing 'cause I could gorge on them. The only drawback is they make your fingers messy, but that's a small price to pay.

I originally found the big jar of these at Costco. They had them for about a minute and then they were gone. Thank goodness for Amazon, because I'm hooked on these almonds. If you like anything salt & vinegar, you'll love 'em! Now if Amazon could offer the large economy-size jar, all would be right with the world.
I love these so much. If you like salt and vinegar chips and you like almonds, you will love these too. They're hard to find in the store but Amazon has you covered.

I do like the Lime taste. It's pretty strong, and very unique. However, at no point in time did I feel like I was eating "Lime and Chili" almonds. There was absolutely no kick from the chili.

Very tasty still, but not what I was hoping for.
These are my favorite flavored almonds!  Intense flavor!  I can't get enough lime.  Hard to find in the stores though sometimes.

This wonderful combination of flavors proves to me that heaven truly exists. If you are a fan of Salt & Vinegar chips, you will LOVE these almonds! I've been through 2 cases of it and counting... shhhhhhhh!
These are the best nuts ever and the value is best with the 6 pack.
I don't need to say much more, these are good. Not really hot like you might assume given that it's jalapeno flavor. They just have a slight kick.
Fantastic bold citrusy flavor.  Not very spicy, but quite savory.  Packet size is just right for a single serving snack.
Great way to purchase the Wasabi & Soy Almonds -- makes it easier to resist the temptation to eat too many!!
VERY GOOD SERVICE, FABULOUS PRODUCT, VERY FRESH, EXTREMELY WELL PACKED.  WILL MOST DEFINITELY ORDER AGAIN.
Both the Bold Jalapeno and the Wasabi Soy almonds have taste great and make a good snack or party treat.

I love these almonds - they are the perfect snack, you don't need to eat a lot to feel satisfied. Also, since they have a lot of flavor, you feel "mouth-satisfied" as well. The wasabi is not too hot (actually I wish it were just a little hotter) and the soy just adds a little bit of saltiness. I recommend these if you like wasabi peas but want something with more nutritional value.

This is my favorite flavor but all the BOLD flavors are helping me stay on my low carb diet.  They taste great, crunchy, mouth full of flavor.  My whole office is now eating my "diet food."  If the sodium is high for your diet, mix them 50:50 with plain unsalted almonds. just YUMMY!
Love the taste not to hot but a little tangy.  Price is good and really good service.

I am on the Atkins diet, have been for four years, and almonds are an important part of snacking, these almonds are delicious. I have found blue diamond to be so fresh, and the salt and vinegar satisfy a multitude of cravings.
Almonds are super nutritional food and while high in fat, are certainly better than cheese puffs!

These are very good.
Like salt-and-vinegar potato chips, but more substantial and delicious. The almond gives a nice hint of sweetness under the assault of the vinegar. I've eaten 2/3rds a can at one sitting.
This was sent as a gift.  More than once I was told how happily they munched on these.  Always feel good to give a winner.
The Habanero BBQ are awesome. They are the perfect balance of sweet and heat. I eat them all day long.

I purchased these Blue Diamond Wasabi Almonds to try out for a snack and they are GREAT.  They are good as a snack between meals and they are quite filling.  My husband really loves the flavor of these Almonds.  I have already purchased another supply.  The price is so much less than at the grocery store and I get them right at my door step.

To start I should say I HATE Almonds. I don't dislike them, I hate them (and I have tried all manner of almonds, from raw to various flavors). A former co-worker brought a huge jug of these to work and urged me to give one a try. Like the stubborn child who refuses to eat her veggies, I popped one in my mouth, with a large glass of water in hand to wash down what I expected to be the awful (to me) flavor. I was shocked to find I not only didn't object to these, but became hooked on them in short order.

I have been unable to find this flavor in the mega jug my co-worked purchased at a big box retailer over a year ago and was pleased to find this option on Amazon for a price lower than my local grogery store. I wish that big jug were available, but these smaller cans probably assure a fresher product.

I will add, that I am a big fan of vinegar, but am not a big fan of salt and vinegar chips. These almonds have an excellent balance of flavor.

Summary: Wasabi Soy Flavor is too salty!
Text: I got this wasabi soy flavor a few weeks ago. Tastes all right. But last week I got up out of bed and I was dizzy. I thought, "hey that happens, no big deal..." A few days ago I was running and I got really light headed. I thought, "hey that happens, it's hot out..." But yesterday I ate a few of these and I realized, "hey these are really salty" Now I don't know if all these things are related, but if there's one thing i'm sure of - it's that these are pretty salty.

The Blue Diamond Lime Chili flavored almonds is the best flavor hands down.  Packages came sealed, and the almonds were fresh and delicious!  You should also try the Blazing Buffalo Wing and Habanero BBQ. The Wasabi and Soy were too salty for me though.
These are awesome. And good for you to boot. Sure there's probably a little too much salt, but everything in moderation, right...

Summary: addicted to ... Lime and Chili Almonds
Text: I love the lime and chili almonds from blue diamond and they are a great snack if you are on a low carb diet. In addition buying the 3-pack of 16oz bags at amazon is a great deal considering that the 6oz can usually costs $3.79 at my grocery store. At first I thought "When am I ever going to finish 3x 16oz bags of almonds" but that's no problem at all. I even have to trick myself and put just a few in a bowl so I won't eat half the bag on one evening. I am addicted to lime and chili almonds and I am O.K. with it. I hope you will enjoy them too.

Summary: Not as hot as you'd think
Text: Blue Diamond almonds are a huge favorite and I like trying all the flavors that they have.  These Habanero BBQ almonds are not spicy and actually have a sweet taste to it due to the bbq flavoring.  Would have liked them to be a bit hotter but taste pretty good as is!

I am so delighted to get these Salt and vinegar Almonds. None of the stores near me carry them. They are actually great for my diet. I can eat as many as I like yet the amount has less calories than if I was eating chips. I can only eat so many nuts at a time while I can pig out on chips and waste lots of calories. My friends are always digging in my closet to see if I have any when they visit. Love them.

mls

We discovered these Blue Diamond almond snacks while on vacation a couple of months ago. We loved them! Our favorites are the Lime and Chili as well as the Salt and Vinegar. They are very tasty as well as healthy. When we got home, we purchased them from Amazon. We bought the 1.5 ounce snack bags. They are perfect for lunches or travel snacks. They also help with portion control!
By purchasing them in bulk from Amazon, we are able to get them for $1 or less per bag. When we purchased them from a convenience store on our vacation we paid $2+ per bag. It's a great savings to buy them here.

My whole family loves these almonds. We're buying a pack of 12 about once a month. Great price (even cheaper than what we've been able to find at the grocery store). Great quality. Healthier than salt & vinegar chips :) Wish Amazon had this item as a Subscribe and Save!!

The Bold Habanero BBQ flavor is amazing!!!  Plain almonds are very tasteless and hard to eat.  However, they are such a powerful and healthy food, I work them into my diet several days a week.  With flavors like this, it makes it very easy to do so.  The price you pay for these on Amazon is second to none!
I absolutely love the new bold Salt & Vinegar almonds by Blue Diamond! It just doesn't get any better than this!

A great flavor and 4g net carbs, 2g sugars. Nearly guilt-free snacking and an awesome amount of fat. These aren't the ideal nut for low-carb and/or keto diets, macadamias are probably closer, but these are much more widely available and the flavors make it easier to snack reasonably.
These Soy & Wasabi almonds from Blue Diamond are my absolute favorite - just enough kick & the almonds tide you over until mealtime. The resealable bag keeps them nice & fresh.  Love them!!
I love all these different flavors that they have come out with for Blue Diamond almonds.  Soooo Goood.  While this one wasn't as good as the Wasabi flavor, it was still delicious.

First tried these at my work vending started buying them everyday $1.25 per 2ozs. (WOW)  Went o Amazon and saw I could get them cheaper so I order 6 bags took them on vacation with me my family loved them all of them wanted to know where to buy them they are just diffrent and that little warm bang surprise is good.  Will contiue to but these.  Good flavor and good price for the larger bag!
These almonds just have a great flavor.  Just the right amount of heat.  It's hard to stop eating them.  Good thing my wife is here to stop me.

These are a delicious and healthy snack when eaten in moderation. The flavor is great and isn't too over powering at all. The wasabi flavor is strong and feels like it's going to be hot but the heat never really shows up.

The taste of these almonds are addictive. They are spicy, but not too hot like you'd think a habanero would be. It's been hard to stay out of them and I eat too many in a day. The price from this seller is stellar and about the same price (per lb) that I find at walmart for a small can.
We will re-order soon as the almonds are almost gone :-)

Summary: A good flavor but not bold in comparison to some of the other flavors and more salt!
Text:
I love all of the Blue Diamond Almond flavors and they are my favorite snack. This one while good was not great for me. When I hear the word "Bold" I expect something over the top and this one was just sort of medium. It seems that they aimed for the middle of the road when it comes to being a spicy flavor! We have Buffalo Wing restaurants here that offer about 6 grades of spiciness from hot to death and this wasn't even close.

If I compare this to the Blue Diamond Wasabi & Soy spiciness it is not even in the same galaxy. This is still a good flavor but not what I was expecting.

One serving of these nuts is 170 Calories and it contains 6 grams of protein, 5 grams of carbohydrates, 3 grams of fiber and only 1 gram of sugar and 1 gram of saturated fat. You also get calcium, vitamin E and magnesium from the almonds which are good for your body, heart and bones. I would rather eat 28 of these almonds for 170 calories than 11 potato chips for the same calories and none of the dietary benefits.

This flavor does have 9% of your daily intake of sodium which is almost twice the amount in many of the other Blue Diamond flavors. It has even 50% more salt than the Bold Salt `n Vinegar flavor? For that reason I will eat this flavor more sparingly.

The only problem with these almonds is that they taste so good you have to be able to close the can and walk away. If you don't like the super bold and spicy flavors then this flavor is ideal for you, just watch the salt.

I like all of the Blue Diamond Almond products as I feel that they are healthier for you as long as you don't overdo it in eating them. Since they have a more moderate flavor than what I was expecting for a "Bold" product and contain so much salt I gave it 4 stars. I eat these almonds because they taste good and are healthier for you but the extra salt in this one negates some of the health benefits in my opinion. This is still a good flavor and I like them but not love them!
These are delicious. I will buy them again and again. They are not for everyone, but if you like wasabi peas, you will love these. The flavoring works great with the taste of almonds.

Summary: LOVE them, but mine arrived melted.
Text: These vitamins are sweet and sour gummies that are easy on a pregnant girls' tummy. I personally do not enjoy them, but they keep the nutrition down. I totally recommend these. However, if it is summer time, buy them from Target. You're safe to order them from Amazon if it isn't extremely hot out...

I bought 5 packs of Spanish Grazer Ring biscuits last week because my wife loves it so much, she loves dipping these biscuits with hot tea and I gotta say it tastes so good. However, my first pack that I opened was broken because of  the packaging. I wasn't really happy with the packaging.

The price is good compared to other butter-type cookies sold where I live, but these weren't quite what I expected. Primarily because I was looking for a butter-cookie taste (like Italian butter cookies or shortbread) but these do NOT taste like butter cookies. They taste almost exactly like Nila Wafers. This isn't bad, of course, but not what I wanted. Each package contains one row of fairly large cookies the size of your palm. I will say that the texture is very nice and crumbly-- the best part.

I found these in a local grocery store and they were quite expensive $4.50 each. I checked on Amazon and found them much cheaper. They taste like shortbread cookies and are quite delicious. However, mine arrived with a few broken pieces.

Russell Stover sugar-free candies are usually good and taste similar to their equivalents made with sugar.  This one is similar to a Snickers bar (but smaller size), and since so few other sugar-free versions exist, this is a real find.  It lasts on the shelf without melting or breaking (as some sugar-free products do), and has a natural aftertastes (not chemical at all).  I'll buy more when they get them back in stock.

Summary: Hi-Tor Neo Diet for Dogs -- Dry food
Text: This is another great product in the Hi-Tor line.  Please see my review for the Neo canned diet for a lengthier review -- it all applies to this Dry Neo food too.  My older dogs who have had kidney disease have had teeth pulled by the vet.  The Dry Neo diet has small chunks & is easy to eat.  All my dogs like the flavor & have not refused the food - ever.  Because the chunks are small, they are easy to moisten with water for the dogs who need to *gum* their meals. I have to take a city bus to get to my vet now.  Ordering my Hi-Tor foods thru Amazon & having it come to my door has been a God send.  It is less expensive than what I get from the vet, I can buy it whenever I want, & it comes right to my door!!  Hi-Tor has done a great job for years supplying pet owners with Special Diets.  I have told all my friends about them & heartily recommend them.

Summary: Great Dog food for dog's with kidney disease
Text:
My dog was recently diagnosed with kidney disease and the vet recommended the k/d diet. I bought a 5lb bag at the vet's office for $32.00 of Hill's Prescription K/D dry dog food. The vet told me that there were different brands and I'd have to experiment to find out which one my dog would like. Not knowing that I would need a prescription for such dog food I went home without a prescription.

My dog seemed to like the food - so knowing that a 5lb bag wouldn't last long I went in search of this special dog food. I went from store to store trying to find the k/d diet dog food. I quickly found out I would need a prescription - of which the vet had to mail to me. Even with the prescription you can only buy this special dog food from a vet's office. Well for me - that's totally inconvenient. My vet's office is a 1/2 hour drive away and with my work schedule and kids - it's not always convenient to drive for an hour just to get dog food.

At one store I found the Hi-Tor Neo Diet food which could be bought without a prescription. The clerk there was exetremely knowledgable and helpful. She told me that the Hi-Tor Neo Dog food was actually better than the Hill's Prescription k/d. I thought I would try it since the 10lb bag was $24.99. My dog loved it! The clerk told me that they might not carry this brand for much longer so I went on the internet and found that Amazon carries this product. Even with shipping I'll be saving more than half of what I would spend at the vet's for a 10lb bag - not to mention the cost of gas and my time for a round trip. I compared the labels and I do believe that Hi-Tor is actually better than the prescription brand. In short, it's better for my dog, my dog likes it, I don't need a prescription and it's half the price with more convenience than the other dog food - what's not to love about it?

My wife liked these as much if not more than Haystacks from Russel Stovers Chocolates. If you like Haystacks / Coconut clusters, these will do.

Chris

Summary: Harney and Sonse Pomegranate Oolong Iced Tea
Text: I received this order late (according to the tracking information I received).  Oddly enough, the shipping box arrived in perfect condition, BUT the actual tin that the tea came in was dented.  This may not mean much, except you pay quite the price for the tin, and I found the dented tin annoying.  I can only "assume" the company sent me a dented tin, based on the shipping box.

Summer is approaching and so is iced tea weather. I figure just because I want cold tea doesn't mean I have to reach for the Lipton bags. I am a fan of most Harney & Sons tea. When you open the tin the aroma of pomegranate is very strong and pleasant. I really enjoy just smelling the tin for a moment. Unfortunately, the love stops there. When brewed you get a very strong taste of the Ti Quan Yin oolong which I honestly don't know how it differs from other oolongs but they said the leaves are Ti Quan Yin so I'm rolling with it. I don't really taste the pomegrante and overall I feel it's a bit bitter. I tried it with agave as well and while it tamed the oolong a bit, I still didn't get that fruity note that I was looking for. I think I'm glad there are only 6 bags to go through on this. I may even try brewing 4 cups of hot water (they recommend 2) and steeping 2 bags in a 2-quart container. I'd rather "waste" a bag experimenting than to toss it aside and let it go stale.

I think this one is probably a pass overall.

I will say my tin was perfect, which is nice because it's pretty and reusable.

At the time of this review, the online product information does not list allergens. I took a chance with Newman's Own because another of their amazon products listed ingredients but did not indicate any allergens. And in my experience, many dark chocolate products are not processed with peanuts. Unfortunately, both Newman's Own products I ordered contain peanut warnings.

Specifically for the peppermint cups: May contain Peanuts, Other Nuts, Milk Powder, Wheat, and Soy.

My son couldn't enjoy them due to his peanut allergy, however, I found them to be very smooth and creamy.

So this company markets Samurai Rice Crackers and Oriental Rice Crackers. I was under the mistaken impression the Samurai version would be spicy. They're not. I got 8 packages. And none have been spicy. There may be a subtle hint of heat. But very subtle.

I love rice crackers for whatever reason. But I could've bought plain rice crackers locally for less. This product is selling for close to 4 bucks a pound + shipping. The bins at Whole Foods, Publix and Fresh Market have it for close to the same price + no shipping. I also have purchased a better-tasting variety at Big Lots, 1 buck for about 12 oz.

What I will say is that it appears these crackers are made for long-term storage. They're in a thick bag that I can't open with just my bare hands. They're really sealed up. If you want to still have rice crackers during a hurricane or if that big earthquake hits, this is a great buy.

Yeah, they are alright.  Just your usual standard rice crackers.  No peas, peanuts, wasabi, or sesame sticks.  The quality is fine, but I was hoping for a little more variety.  Costco seems to have stopped carrying their oriental mix here and I was looking for a replacement.  Not with this product though.

Summary: Barry Farm  Oriental Rice Cracker mix
Text:
If you are looking for a good, mild, oriental rice cracker mix, this is it! Taste is fantastic, price very reasonable. The down side is the shipping, which costs more than the total of 4 or 5 products!
But I would still recommend.
This is a great treat for my 3 dogs. It keeps them busy and full in between meals. Can keep enough on hand. :o)

I love all of the Beefeaters products but this is the very best according to my dogs! My four labs love really these treats!  I believe this product is healthier than most dog treats and give them to my dogs often. They enjoy all of the different sizes and it's nice to have options (e.g. quick treat or slow treat).  I highly recommend these treats!
These are the favorite treats for my two Westies. It keeps them busy and they have never had any issues with digestion.

These treats are huge, and they sell them at the boutique dog shops for $4.99 for one, so I'm happy to buy them in "bulk".  They work really well with my dogs because for some reason, my dogs don't like just plain old rawhide.  They like the chicken on top.  I don't buy the flavored rawhide because it usually stains.  And these treats last a long time.

As a professional petsitter, I am always looking for tasty "rewards" for my canine clients. They all love their Beefeater rawhides rolls with chicken meat. Although they are alittle pricey, seeing how much they enjoy them is worth the extra expense.Beefeaters Rawhide Roll with Chicken Meat, 5-Inch

Summary: Dogs love em, owner hates em
Text: My dogs love the flavor of these things and they can spend hours chewing on them.  The problem is they are SO MESSY.  They are covered in chicken that flakes off all over the place.  I like the concept of chicken covered rawhide but I need to find ones that don't require a vacuum!!

Seriously, what could POSSIBLY be in these thing to make them worth so much?!?

I thought Target was on crack asking $14.99!!

Last time I checked Rawhide was the skin of a cow? Is this beacuse they can't make leather jackets out of it?

Summary: The freshest and best nuts you'll ever have!
Text: I used to live close to Fastachi and went there often to purchase nuts for myself as well as friends and family for holidays and house warming. They roast the nuts there in the shop. The cashews just melt in your mouth they are so fresh. The mixes they offer are awesome. I personally love the cranberry nut mix. I was surprised and delighted to see they can be purchased here on Amazon! You won't be disappointed! Enjoy!

Never mind the nuts are packaged in a brown bag. My family thoroughly enjoyed snacking on Fastachi Super Nut Mix.  I have since purchased this mix again and other mixes packaged in tins to give as gifts.

Summary: Fastachi offers the best nuts. Period.
Text:
If you like nuts, wait until you try this Fastachi mix. The nuts are carefully selected, none are broken, they are hand roasted in small batches and a light sea salt adds to the goodness.
Perfection! Impossible to find a better product anywhere. I have used many of the Fastachi products and am always amazed - never disappointed.

My favorite snack is mixed nuts without peanuts. These nuts are frest and delicious, with a nice salting. A nice blend, different from the canned variety. They come one pound in a paper bag with a sealed plastic bag outside that. So you will want to put them in a sealed container. Delicious! I don't usually write reviews, but I wanted to let the seller know how much I liked them.
Jim
I purchased these nuts as a gift and was disappointed when they arrived in a small brown paper bag, not a nice tin or box as I expected. I would not order again.

Having owned a coffee (retail) business for 14 years, I found the Altura Organic San Francisco blend to be one of the best packaged blends I've ever tasted.  Rich deep flavor showing that this company understands.  Highly recommended.

I bought two bags of the Altura whole bean coffee off an Amazon special. The price was great, the surprise is how wonderful the coffee is! Deep, dark, oily, fragrant beans, high moisture content, rich flavor and aroma. I had to cut down my normal scoop levels this coffee is so rich.

If you like a big-flavored, dark roast...Altura organic is hard to beat.
I do a French Press every morning...I like it even more than Pete's. Took it to my brother, a discriminating cappuccino drinker...he has now switched to Altura's San Fran Blend.Even if the bag is marked Swiss process decaf on the side of the bag, it is definitely full-test!Confirmed by a call to Altura and the strong jolt I receive from one cup!

My only question is how does Amazon sell it for only $14.77 for 2 LBs and no shipping (On Subscription)..I just hope it lasts, because I am a huge fan.
I drink a lot of coffee and this ranks with the best.  Beans are dark and delicious when ground.  Good packaging.

I've been a long-time loyalist to Cafe Altura's Dark French Roast, but wanted to try something new.  The San Francisco Blend is just as bold as the dark French, but has a brighter smell that reminds me of San Francisco in the Spring.  Highly recommended.

Well we finally "bit the bullet" and ordered a burr coffee grinder from Amazon. We decided to get some of this coffee to start out our home grinding experience. Yesterday morning, the mailman arrived with our package. We have brewed 4 pots so far.

First, no complaints about the caffeine. You can get quite a buzz on a couple of cups. And the beans are beautiful.

It is not bitter or acidic - it's nice & smooth. I was disappointed with the the almost total lack of the wonderful aroma noted by other reviewers, though. It just seems to lack any outstanding flavor or character. Tastes similar to many better grocery store blends I have used in the past. Although my wife liked it better than I did, when asked if she would buy it again - she said: "Probably not."

I'm not encouraged to try any of their other blends based on this experience. We will probably stick with Howe's, which is sold at our grocer. At least you can smell it before buying.

Maybe my expectations were just too high.

Smooth, rich, flavorful!  The beans are so rich and dark they almost disappear in the predawn moonlight except.  I can wake up just smelling them grinding each morning.  I tried a wide variety of coffes in my life but this is hands down my favorite!  If I can't get it, the other Altura blends are almost as good.

Summary: The best all around waker upper!
Text: This coffee is the household staple.  Love the all around flavor and darkness.  Great with or without sugar and easy on the palette.  Auto ship is the best!

The coffee is smooth and not acidic at all. It is, however, very oily, so much so that it clumps inside my grinder. Wish it had a richer taste. It helps to make it a little stronger than normal. It is not as wonderful as the San Francisco coffee that I remember from about 15 years ago on a trip, but I don't know who the roaster was. Guess you can drink to a memory, but not drink one itself. Oh, well. Only problem was that the delivery person left it down the block somewhere, and and the package got wet during a deluge. The packaging of the coffee itself was strong enough to withstand that. However, I couldn't open it and had to end up cutting off the resealable strip.

Recently cancelled Amazon subscription for a bag of these beans every month.  Last two shipments arrived with vacuum seal on the bag broken.  The shipping packaging suggests that this is a factory problem, not one with Amazon, but nevertheless the freshness of the beans is compromised.  The question of product tampering arises as well.  Can't claim any expert opinion on the quality of the beans, were good enough for me and attractively priced.  But the vacuum packing is for a good reason, and they've been shipping defective product to/for Amazon, I suspect.

Cafe Altura's San Francisco Blend is a delicious, dark blend.  My boyfriend remarked just this morning that the aroma filling the air after I ground the beans was "just like GOOD coffee is supposed to smell."  I like this variety second only to Cafe Altura's Biodynamic French Roast.  They are both great... the french roast just has a bit more of a "pure" quality to it.  Both are a great deal when purchased through Amazon's Subscribe and Save program!
I like a deep roasted aromatic coffee that can stand up to a huge slosh of half and half. This one can. I'll buy again.
We really enjoyed the coffee!  We used to drink Starbucks House Blend.  This  coffee is just better!

Summary: Be careful, this is a true french roast
Text:
I had initially written a poor review for this coffee. However, I tried it again and I've developed a newfound appreciation for what they have here.

It is rare to find a true french roast in a consumer branded coffee. Most of what is called a french roast is really a full city roast (sometimes not even that). The difference is stark. However, I blame Starbucks for giving me a taste for a full french roasted bean. And that is at least partially what you get here. I'd estimate the blend at about 40% full french roast and the rest ranging from full city to full city roast +. The net effect is a strong cup of coffee that, yes, will taste a bit scorched if you aren't accustomed to it.

However, if you're looking for that same high octane kick that you get from Starbucks coffee then this may be the way to go. However don't be surprised when you see very darkly roasted beans that are true full french roast. Also, don't be surprised by a slightly higher caffeine kick!

This is the second, and last, time I will buy coffee from amazon.com.  The first time, I received a bag of coffee that had been out of date for months.  This time, it's still stale, but without a use-by date on the bag.  So much for trying to save some money and time.  I'll go back to making the trek to Whole Foods.

This positive review is as much about the company, Cafe Altra as the product.  I had a problem with a recent shipment, via Amazon.  I contacted Cafe Altura directly via email.  They called me directly the very next morning.  They were professional and responsive in EVERY way (and friendly too!).  They handled my concern quickly and efficiently.  Even a bit later, when they realized a delay in my final resolution, they called me to advise there was a minor delay to resolution and wanted to make sure I knew they were handling my concern as promised.  Yes, they called me.  By the way, the concern was, in my opionion, relatively minor but I was treated like it was a major issue.  I will definiately continue to buy this coffee brand because of both 1) excellent coffee and 2) a company that backs their product with excellend customer service.  I do want to state that I might have been lucky in that I was contacted within about 12 hours of my concern (via phone, not email reply) and I don't want to sound like we could all expect that every time should a problem arise, but my experience was close to perfection and I would not be surprised if this level of service is the norm.  Excellent all around.

I don't know if I got a bad bag, but the beans that I received smelled extremely funky.  Almost fishy.  The coffee that they made was decent, certainly better than I would have expected given the smell of the un-ground beans.  Nevertheless, I threw most of the package away, as I couldn't stand the smell of the beans, even when only semi-conscious in the morning (before drinking coffee, of course).
I'm ecstatic that the best tasting coffee I've purchased in recent years is  also organic, environmental, etc.

My boyfriend and I LOVE this tea. Though it doesn't necessarily feel as though it "cleanses" you, it certainly makes you feel clean. Typically cleansing teas taste awful but the Bija tea has a wonderful taste. It is my favorite tea by far.

Deep Cleanse from Bija provides a strong cinnamon flavor while providing you with the most powerful detoxifying herbs such as burdock root, dandelion root, licorice root, fennel seed, nettle leaf, oatstraw herb and yellow dock root! Adding this tea to your diet will definitely help you to look and feel better!

I don't just limit this sauce to dipping in gyoza (although nothing on earth can beat it for dipping in some fresh, hot gyoza!). It is wonderful on almost anything. I add it to steamed veggies, meatloaf, even to baked macaroni and cheese. It is so delicious and adds a fantastic flavor to pretty much anything you can imagine.

Dynasty Potsticker Sauce is a winner!  It's as tasty as any I've had in Chinese restaurants--the perfect blend of soy sauce and spices.  It complements the potsticker w/o overpowering its taste.  I love it, and am very hopeful that Amazon will again stock it--and SOON!

Summary: Bad Packaging, Great product but can't recommend shipping
Text:
I'm giving this a one star because obviously there is a problem with the packaging seals on this product. The only reason I order is that I don't have time to go buy these at a local store which is about an hour from my house--thus ordering makes sense. Except that when my shipment arrives there are 3 packages out of the 6 boxes that are leaking. I open up the box and there is a terrible stench. Spoiled coconut water smells awful, especially in the 100 degree summer temps we've been having. So I unpack the boxes, and pour out the spoiled contents because of the smell, and then go to Amazon to try to report that 3 out of the 6 boxes in the package were damaged. Well, it looks like the only option is to return the package or request a refund. I need the other 3 boxes that were not leaking, and can't find an option to report this to anyone. Then I read the other reviews for this product and note that I'm not the only one whose experienced issues with leaking during shipment. Since there doesn't appear to be a way to be credited for only the items in the shipment that were leaking, and keep the others, and I would have had to get clean boxes and repack the horrible smelling boxes in new packaging to ship back, I just decided to keep the undamaged ones, and to let others know. I won't be ordering this size again in the future, and will just make the one hour trip to my grocer that carries the larger size and then buy locally in bulk next time.

Note: if you try the product it is really good, but the packaging leaves a lot to be desired.

Summary: Vita Coco Buyers BEWARE- Mold inside
Text:
Length:: 0:32 Mins

I have been on the coconut water wagon for over 2 years now. I truly feel there is no better coconut water than the one that comes directly from the source in hand. Because fresh coconuts are not easy to find I started buying Vita Coco over a year ago. From all other coconut waters out there I felt theirs was the best tasting, best quality and I also liked the fact that the source of the water came from just one country and not multiple ones. I have been a happy consumer for over a year, most of my purchases came from the local supermarket until I decided to purchase the vita coco 6 pack on Amazon as part of the subscribe and save program I gave a box to my mother in law. Earlier this week she opened one of the containers and she said the taste seemed a bit off, a little rancid and she felt like I had swallowed something more than just water. She decided to take a closer look and I was appalled at what she uncovered. Huge chunks of mold her water; it made her sick to her stomach. I am sad to say that after this experience we will no longer consume this product. My concern is what kind of quality control is out there and is this the first incident. I have heard many reviews talking about rancid taste and moldy taste I wonder how many of those containers had the same stuff inside. Worse of all is that I have been giving this water to my 3 year old who loves coconut water. My mother in law sealed the container and took these pictures I have contacted the company but I have yet to hear from anyone.

Again, I had a problem with the product leaking --- Both my original and replacement order. The manufacturer's packaging simply does not protect the contents enough. The box soaked through and this time, one of the top faces just tore right off because it was so damp.

When I buy other liquids from Amazon such as the "Zola Acai drink"
([...]), the plastic containers are better equipped to sustain the shipping process unlike these coconut water cartons.

I really enjoy Vita Coco's coconut water products. The taste is light, refreshing and hardly sweet at all. And yes, it is thirst-quenching. However, I do not recommend this larger packaging size. The other tetra packaging for the smaller individual cartons is better equipped for impact. Since I lost much of the drink from the leakage on both orders, I cannot give a high rating. However, I will give credit where credit is due and Amazon has been prompt to respond to my concerns.

Summary: Electrolyte and potassium rich, no added sugar
Text:
This product also comes in the single serving size
Vita Coco 100% Pure Coconut Water, 11.1-Ounce Containers (Pack of 12)
with little straws attached. The single-servings have 11.1 ounces, while the 34-ounce carton says it has four servings of 8.5 ounces each. I still drink about 11+ ounces per serving, so get a little more than 3 servings per carton.

This is 100% pure natural coconut water, with no added sugar. The 8.5-ounce size serving contains 45 calories, 0 fat calories, 30mg of sodium, 515mg of potassium, 11g carbohydrate in the form of naturally-occurring sugars (no fiber), 0g protein, 4% of the daily value (based on a 2,000 calorie diet) of calcium, 4% daily value of phosphorous, 175% of the daily value of Vitamin C, 0% daily value of iron, and 8% daily value of magnesium. This means that Vita Coco 100% pure coconut water has more electrolytes, with 15 times more potassium, than leading sports drinks, without the added sugars and/or artificial sweeteners and other added ingredients (dyes, etc.)

It gives excellent hydration. My only regret is that I didn't find Vita Coco before I did a 26.2-mile marathon back in 2002. I still take frequent walks, and with Vita Coco, I never cramp.

I have noticed that my blood is clotting better/wounds are healing more quickly. I occasionally get small scratches from my cat, and have gotten various scratches from shrubbery encountered on my walks, and recently, a sharp knife got the better of me and I cut my fingertip. It was during these recent instances that I noticed the faster healing time and better blood clotting. I monitor my body's processes closely and can attribute these improvements, at least in large part, to consuming coconut water.

Highly recommended!

My discovery of coconut water was brought on by a search for a natural alternative to Pedialite (There aren't many pronouncable ingredients in Pedialite and none I'd put in my baby's little body.) Coconut water is the best alternative, good for you, and the taste is simply refreshing. Not too sweet, but not boring either! A great solution to dehydration! This size is great to keep in the fridge. . . certainly more friendly to the environment! A great price on Amazon . . .

The product is delicious. But I had shipping problems. I ordered 12 boxes (pack of 6). Each box came in at different times, with different UPS tracking numbers. So I had to make sure I was home on different days, and had to keep track of each package. One package was damaged in shipping. UPS reported the damage, and I was reimbursed. On the rest of the shipment (11 separate packages), some of the individual VITA Coco 34 oz boxes leaked.  The aluminum seal is not very strong, and caused the coconut water to leak in several boxes. The seal in the 11 oz package of VITA Coco is bigger and stronger than the seal in the 34 oz package.  I would never have this item shipped again, unless they change the packaging. I think the leak was not the fault of UPS, but the fault of VITA Coco packaging. I bought the 34 oz box from a grocery, and noticed that some of the seals were also defective.

I ordered two boxes of 6 VitaCoco water. I only received one box, so clearly I was miffed that I was missing half my order. Making matters worse, after opening the box that contained the six Vitacocos, the packing cardboard was clearly wet, and indeed a box had burst and leaked Vitacoco water all over the insides.

According to the Amazon returns policy, the items could not be returned, but customer service was willing to refund the purchase. So kudos to Customer Service, but jeers for everything else.

Summary: Vita Coco 100% Pure Coconut Water, 34 oz  Boxes pack of 6
Text:
Amazon.com packed this product very well and the package was not damaged during shipment.

The Vito Coco product I ordered and received (as titled) was not as good condition. On 4 of the 34 oz boxes, the seals were broke slightly. All 4 with broken seals were dripping very slightly - very noticeable as I held onto them. The slight pressure used to hold them caused the dripping out of the seal before ever removing the seal. Two of the containers was smashed on the top - both of which were 2 of the 4 with broken seals. When I opened some of the shipping packages of these products, it smelled moldy.

The seal for the opening is flimsy and could easily be damaged. Some of the seals were far too easy to remove - not the kind of seal you want to use for this heavy weight - 34 oz product.

I only have one other coconut water to compare this product to, and that is the brand O.N.E. Compared to O.N.E., the taste of this product was off - a taste of decay or mold. Some tasted moldier than others. I drank them all anyway (with no apparent ill affects), except for 3 of the 4 in which the seals were broken. 3 of the 4 with broken seals, I poured down the drain.

The price of the 34 oz 6 pack product of Vita Coco is excellent in comparison to other coconut water brands on the market, but is it worth it? Not to me. I will not be buying this product again unless they improve IF the price remains the same.
My family is from the West Indies.  This is a little sweeter than we're used to, but I would still say it's delicious.  It's the best I've had where I didn't literally stick the straw in the coconut.

Summary: No leaks, No dents, great taste, seems like the packing issues have been fixed
Text: Vita Coco's packing was a fitted box with extra cardboard and probably not enough on it's own. Amazon's added heavy duty bubble wrap that had very little give (different to what I usually see for other items) and box was packed well and I got my Vita Coco in quick time and in perfect condition. No leaks, no dents, all 6 boxes tasted good! Will now consider the monthly subscription. I was hesitant based on the poor reviews I saw about packing...but I think Amazon seems to have fixed that. Also I got from the other reviews that there was a bad batch that got shipped out which affected a lot of people. It also seemed that most people got replacements which I would be fine with. Will buy again.
Vita Coco.  The most repulsive tasting coconut water on the market.  I won't be buying them again. I have had the plain flavor.
I purchase both Zico and Vita, like both of it, but I think Vita is best in taste, zica kinda water down on taste.  From now on Vita will be my choice of coco water.

Summary: 1 Liter for about the calories of a can of coke
Text:
First, let me note that there are several different manufacturers of these 1 liter bottles of coconut water. I have tried this variety (Vita Coco) and the Zico brand, which were comparable in price and quality. Both were delicious, though only about half the people here at the office that tried it shared that opinion. So young coconut water may be something of a specific taste.

I'm a fan of coconut water (both Zico and Vita Coco) because they are very refreshing when served cold. As they claim, it does naturally contain some of the same compounds found in sports drinks that are supposed to speed hydration (take that with a grain of salt...water hydrates just as well as anything).

But best of all - 34 fl. ounces (1L) of (Zico/Vita Coco) coconut water = ~173 calories. One can of coke (12 fl. oz) = ~143 calories (according to the label, other sites claim more). The cocount water also has a fair amount of potassium and a small amount of other vitamins, whereas cola has almost no nutritional value at all.

Highly recommended. Both companies shipped my coconut water all the way to Afghanistan in good sturdy packaging too, I might add.

I ordered for 12 containers of above coconut water of 34 ounces each. The packing was not good, actually one container was leaking.

The taste of the Coconut water was as good as any other Coconut water that I have ordered from you in the past few years or from some other supplier.

Please give me a ceredit for the one that was leaking on pro rata basis.

Thanks.

Summary: This does NOT taste like coconut water.
Text: If I wanted to drink water that tastes like white bread: I'd drink Vita coco.  I grew up in the Caribbean, and coconut water doesn't taste like this.

Summary: Great product but clearly cannot be shipped!
Text: I have been drinking coconut water for a couple of years and I got my father drinking it by going on the Subscribe & Save program and shipping this to him. I finally cancelled it because at least 2 of the containers would be leaking, the box would be soaked, and it's not such a great price if you're only getting 4 boxes out of it. It's crazy and I have received no response from Amazon or Vita Coco regarding my complaints. I am a loyal Amazon customer and that will not change, but I will never order Vita Coco to be shipped again.

Summary: DONT BUY FROM AMAZON, GO TO LOCAL STORE
Text: I usually never write a review but I feel compelled to do it this time. THe packaging is very poor. The coconut water color are dark, almost black. It is crazy that they are selling spoilt food products and get away with it.
Coconut water was somewhat sour tasting, probably due to the fact that the expiration date was very close. I will cancel the subscription and continue to buy this product in a supermarket.

Summary: Pretty good, but costing a bit too much!
Text:
The juice is very light in taste. I like it, but it's very expensive. I got this for $18.27 and it's higher now.
I had no problem with packaging. It's great!
I'm going back to buying the young coconuts at the market for now. The fresh juice from the young coconuts has much more sweeter taste.

Summary: Safely packaged, but careful opening it!
Text:
The coconut water was great - the usual taste I've come to expect from Vita Coco plain coconut water. It's pretty good for packaged, store-bought coconut water.

The packaging is terrible.
- The containers have a seal you need to tear in order to pour. When you pull on the tiny tab, 2 out of 3 will rip without opening the seal.
- The six containers were well protected in carton shell, but they were a bit hard to take out. I ended up ripping off one of them open while removing it from packaging, and spilling some product. This is because the plastic top (opening) sticks out a bit from the side, as to help with pouring without dripping. However the problem is that it's easy to get it ripped open as you're sliding it out of the carton packaging.
Too much packaging, great product - almost half off what I pay for this in NYC. Arrived promptly.  More words to fill the 20-word quota.

Summary: Best coconut water in a tetra pack
Text: Its the best and most natural form of coconut water that we can get in a tetra pack. and its cheaper than buying a tender coconut and going through the hassle of cracking it.

I purchased a pack of 6 boxes of 33.8 ounce Vita Coco coconut water.  The package arrived fine.  I put 3 boxes in my refrigerator.  Boy, did they make a mess!  All 3 started leaking overnight.  My wife was not happy at all. I transferred the leaking packs to soda bottles.  I don't want to try putting the remaining 3 packs in the refrigerator and will transfer to soda bottles as well.  I wish I could get a refund, but there is no way to return now, and no easy way to contact the vendor.  This turned out to be a real pain!

Hands down the best coconut water I've ever had.  I've already ordered about 5 cases of these things and will order more when I run out.  The only downside I've experienced with it is the packaging.  My 2nd and 3rd order came in and apparently some of the cartons were punctured, which give off a terrible smell in the package.  I contacted amazon about the problem and they immediately refund my order.  I received my most recent order today and was pleasantly surprised to see all of the bubble wrap around the product.  Each carton was perfectly protected and I'm very happy with my purchase.  I guess they've received enough complaints about the shoddy packaging to finally fix it.  This price is unbeatable btw.

Ive been drinking coconut water my whole life and seriously LOVE the stuff. When I first found VitaCoco all i could think was these guys are geniuses and somehow managed to create a coconut drink that actually tastes like the real coconut. When I saw amazon was selling the product in boxes of 6 i thought, "Even better, its shipped right to my door." That is until i received my second shipment and found a box full of sticky Vita Coco packages with two of the boxes open and half empty. I decided it would be apt o return the boxes, but for whatever reason, that is not in the Amazon return policy.

Conclusion:
Love the product, but the shipment packaging sucks and Amazon wont allow you to receive credit or return the broken boxes.

I love it because it is the most natural coconut water i've ever tasted. I have tried many different products but this one is really pure coconut water.  no additives or sugar...........i so love coconut water.

Something is definitely wrong with vita coco's boxes. Two of them leaked enough to soak the cardboard boxes they came in. I checked and it appears to be something wrong with their peal back seals rather than the boxes themselves and I will be calling the company so they can address their faulty packaging since it's not Amazon. The drink itself is better than a few that I've tried thus far. I mix them with protein powder after the gym or sip them on their own. Very tasty. Better than Zico which tasted strange to me.

If you order it and get a pack that leaks, call the company and complain. They need to know from anyone who has a leaking product that their product is faulty. It's not amazon as the foil seal on the boxes wasn't secure. In fact, I'll be raising issues of product tampering as a safety issue.

The drink itself is great. The packaging not so much.

Afer purchasing this product at a store, I could not find it again.  I tried Whole Foods, World Market, and a couple of specialty stores.  It was great ordering on Amazon.  This water is awesome for steaming rice.  It delivers sweetness without too much coconut flavor.

Summary: VITA COCO Needs better packing they leak during shipping
Text: I love the drink the only probem is when the box gets beat up duning shippiing I have several of the boxes leak.

Summary: It's tasted just like fresh coconut juice.
Text: When I was little and in Vietnam, I used to taste coconut juice every time I went to the country-side to visit my grandparents.  This brings back that memory.  I really like it.  It's not too sweet, and I can definitely taste a salty element of the juice.  However, it's a balanced taste.  At first, when you take a sip, it might taste a little sour or as if it has gone bad.  However, the more you drink it, the better it gets. One warning though:  it's a natural laxative.  So, be very careful where you are drinking for the very first time.  Let your body have a reacation to it first before bringing to sport events, work, etc.  It's better when chilled.  Enjoy :)
it came with a pack leaking, wet the whole box. the product is good, but to pay this much money and only able to enjoy 5 pack that you actually paid for 6 is not a good deal.

Summary: box was delivered leaking all over my front porch
Text: The box was delivered leaking all over my front porch. The person that delivered it had to have known and they snuck off without even knocking on the door. I have notified Amazon.com and have not had a reply yet.

Vita Coco Coconut Water has become a vital part of my day. A few months ago, I read that Vita Coco has 15 times more electrolytes than any sports drink on the market. However, I do not consider this drink just a sports drink. For example I have swapped my morning coffee with a 100% pure Vita Coco. Unlike drinking coffee and than crashing, Vita Coco makes me feel energized throughout the day! Whenever I make breakfast smoothies, I always use Vita Coco. Below is a great recipe to try!

3 cups frozen strawberries
1 banana (or 1 cup of blueberries)
1 cup Vita Coco (I use 100% pure)
1 cup of icecubes (optional)

Place all ingredients in a blender and puree well. Add more Vita Coco if needed for smoothier consistency. Too easy, too good!

I swear by this drink. I used to get cramping in my muscles and shin splints after running...but when I drink this before and after my run, I do not feel any pain....

Simply put when I drink Vita Coco, I feel more refreshed and healthier. So thanks for making such a great product!
Delicious and transaction was quick and professional.Drinking this product definitely made you feel good about what you were taking into your body and was truly yummy.

I love my Vita Coconut water! It is wonderful! I use it in my smoothies and in other recipes everyday. Great stuff! When you live too far from a grocery store to get fresh coconuts, this is the best alternative.

Summary: Tastes great but packaging needs improvement!
Text: I signed up for the subscription hoping the bad reviews were just flukes on the shipping.  The taste is great as always, but one of my boxes was damaged in shipping and leaked all over my laundry room.  I should have contacted the retailer to get it replaced but I just mopped up the mess and made a mental note to cancel my subscription and order a smaller size.  I do wish they would address the shipping/packing problem as it has been mentioned more than once on this site.  Whomever is making the executive decisions for their packing and shipping needs to come up with a better plan or more customers will go elsewhere!

If you like coconut water, this is for you! I had bought this product at a local market to try, while having chemo. Turns out the more i drank, the more i wanted! It has potassium in it, and some chemo makes you potassium deficient. So, i felt better drinking this product,along with lots of water, to say hydrated.

It's summertime, with lots of days over 100 degrees F. in Central California. Vita Coco 100% Pure Coconut Water comes to the rescue! It's the most refreshing drink I have ever had, and the added Vitamin C takes care of that nutritional requirement at the same time. Also, Vita Coco tastes much better than other coconut waters I have tried.

Amid all the horror stories and bad experiences with this product that several other people have unfortunately had, I would like to write my own review. Vita Coco is my favorite brand of coconut water and I have been drinking it for a couple years now, and I recently decided to try ordering by the case here at Amazon instead of hunting down the odd carton or two at stores across my city (it's not that easy to find in San Antonio!) like I had been doing before. I was weary of giving Amazon a shot because of the other reviews with people's negative experiences, but luckily and thankfully I experienced none of those shipping and/or quality control issues with the water! My box of 6 1L Vita Coco's arrived promptly, was well packaged and the water itself was well within a reasonable expiration date (April 2013)! I couldn't be happier and look forward to getting my cases of VC shipped to me on a regular monthly basis with Subscribe & Save now! Hooray!

Summary: One of my favorite brands, good price
Text: I've tried many brands and this is one of my favorites. The cheapest I've seen this in stores is at WaWa (NE gas station, rep!) and it's $2.50 for a 17fl oz box.

Summary: coconut water leaking from one of the cartons
Text: Taste was good but CocoLibre is superior.  I am giving the product only 2 stars because of 6 cartons, one of them was unusable because it was leaking from the bottom and we don't know if it was contaminated.
This is the only time I will order this.  I like coconut and I like water but this stuff is nasty.  Maybe I got a bad batch or something but I won't make that mistake twice.

First of all I LOVE VitaCoco Coconut water!! So ordering it was a no brainer for me. I had read several reviews that some people had issues with leaking containers when they received their shipment. It appears that Amazon or VitaCoco has taken steps to remedy this problem. I ordered the 6 - 33.8oz containers. They came packaged snug in a box that fit them perfectly. And that box was then wrapped in bubble wrap and put inside another box! No leaking! I am sooo happy with my order. I hope this review will help others with the decision on ordering this product. Based on some of the reviews that I had read, I almost didn't order from online. Hope this helps =)
I use it in my organic juices as a base sometimes lots of k and sweet, but low in cals, if you have not tried coco water, please do

Summary: Delicious, Healthy PERFECT! except....... THEY DIDN"T COME WITH STRAWS..........................
Text: I didn't buy this from amazon, but it doesn't really matter. So, delicious drink! buy it. very nutritious. the second it enters your mouth you forget youre not drinking from a real coconut. there's only two ingredients : coconut water, vitamin C. its a great buy and tastes delicious. non fat. healthy. NO STRAWS.......... there's supposed to be a straw.. i don't know what happened but apparently there's no straw . i bought it at costco.......

I had a friend turn me on to coconut water for running because of the high amounts of potassium it has. It also has no added sugar and is a great alternative to gatorade. I think it tastes great cold and I like the convienince and packaging of the 1 quart boxes. I hope they continue to use the boxes instead of plastic because it biodegrades a little easier. Amazon had a great deal on a 6 pack of these, and you can't get them cheaper anywhere else. I paid about $1.70 for an 8 oz box in a grocery store. This was $3-4 for 4 times the amount.

Summary: Purest tasting coconut water after fresh coconuts!
Text: I don't know about the energizing levels but this tastes great and provides great health benefits! You really feel the difference when you come in from the heat during summer and have this! very thirst quenching compared to water which isn't enough usually. wish they would give more deals, discounts and promo codes! I do love this so but the price prevents me from buying it more often.

I found this product to be a great alternative to sport drinks. It is loaded with potassium but does not have the salt and sugar found in traditional sport drinks. The flavor is a little bland by itself so I add a little unsweetened fruit juice and it really fits the bill. Highly recommended!

I am a brazilian living in the US and drank VitaCoco in Brazil for many, many years. Out of all the coconut waters I have tried, VitaCoco is the one that is the freshest of all, it can't be beat.
I saw a few other reviews that the customer had problems with the shipping (leaking boxes), but I haven't had any problems so far, with 2 shipments of these liter packages. I have a third on the way, I am hoping for a hat trick.

It tastes really nice. No preservatives or artificial ingredients. 100% coconut water. Not too sweet n not sour like other brands. I am use to drinking coconut water from a coconut n this is the closest on taste I have ever found.

Very tasty stuff!!! I heard all about how this is the greatest drink ever, although 99% of what I heard I believe is hype I'm sure some of the claims have their root in fact.  It really did help me get over some pretty nasty hangovers.

Great product but I must agree with other reviewers about packaging - ordered two cases. One was fine. The other one had one of the corners of one of six cartons frayed and about half a cup of cocowater made the packaging damp. Not sure how it gets frayed as it was packaged inside two other boxes... Great product, bad packaging.

Looks like Amazon is doing something about it since the item is under review. Kudos to them!
This is as close to the 'Real McCoy' in Coconut Water as one will get.  It's really like "Sticking a straw in a Coconut".  A-1.

Amazon does not always carry this 34-ounce container of Vita Coca Coconut Water (comes in package of 6). Wait, however, and it pops up on occasion.

I think this is the best, sweetest tasting coconut water around. Even the Vita Coco in the smaller containers do not match the taste of the 34-ounce package. I have no idea why this would be the case, but after months of comparing it is simply, to my taste buds, true.

The Amazon price is comparable to the prices I find at our local grocery store. Note that if Amazon does not have it in stock, private sellers do, and they always charge a lot more (plus shipping!).

Growing up in South-Asia, I drank coconut water almost everyday from real coconuts. This product comes just as close to the real thing as possible. Great taste, quenches your thirst, I always take one with me when playing sports, way better than some sports drink, at least in my opinion.

I have tried other brands of coconut water and have found Vita Coco to be the best.  I drink it after a long run or on hot days just to stay hydrated.  And as always, I found it for a great price on Amazon.

Summary: The best coconut water sold here!
Text:
When they say it is like putting a straw in a
coconut they are telling the truth..Clean, clear,
crisp taste..

I travel from Michigan to the Caribbean with
one sip...

Sit back and enjoy.....

This coconut water is the best drink I have ever had.  I'm not much for drinking water, and this is a good alternative to keeping hydrated.  I have also found that coconut water helps greatly with digestion and regulating your system much like activia claims to do.  If  you suffer from stomach ailmants this will help to get you back on track if you drink it regularly.

Summary: best tasting coconut water in a box so far
Text:
i bought this from a local store after trying various other brands (zico, harvest bay and 2-3 others that I can't remember).

Hands down, this one is the best. the other brands had a much more mild coconut flavor, and none of the sweetness you get from fresh coconut water. vitacoco is there on all fronts.

now, I won't say it tastes exactly the same as fresh coconut water, but in a pinch, it's definitely the best brand I've found.

also, just as a price hint, look for it at your local stores. I'm in Seattle and found it at Fred Meyer on sale: $3 for 34oz box...half the price of amazon. unfortunately, fred meyer only had 1 box left. :(

I used to live in Hawaii and really missed fresh coconut water. The water from supermarket coconuts are hit and miss. I have tried Zico, ONE and Vita Coco, and although they are all good, I find Vita to be the best tasting. The only complaint I have is that it is a little pricey, but it is worth it for something so tasty and healthy.

Just one more note, you sometimes see coconut water in cans. That stuff usually has fillers and added sugar. Always read the labels before buying because there is a lot of junk out there.

Its taste is very similar to that of fresh natural coconut water. I love it!
Purchasing Vita Coco from this vendor and website was easy and hassle free.
Great real coconut young coconut taste. Not the usual overwhelming sweet taste seen on other coconut water canned drinks.  Good on the environment. Made in Brazil. Even better.

I love this stuff. It truly is the best and does what it says - hydrates every cell in your body, and revitalizes,as well.I can feel the difference when I drink plain water for thirst, and then this. Vita Coco and O.N.E. Coconut water are without a doubt the best thirst-quenchers and energy boosters out there.

If you ever had a fresh coconut, you know how rare the water is in each coconut.  There just isn't enough juice in a fresh whole coconut to fully quench a thirst.  Well Vita Coco just did all the work for you.  Each carton is 100% pure coconut water.  This stuff taste fantastic cold and you can just gulp an entire 11 oz pack in like 5 seconds.  People say it is provides better hydration that sports drinks and a ton of other scientific stuff about it, but in the end, I just bought it cause I like the taste of coconut water and this is pure 100% coco water.  Get it both for taste and it's health benefits.

I love this stuff. Very thirst quenching and
re-hydrating. I wish it were less expensive.
My local Food Emporium at UWS carries this product for $4.19 per 34oz pack so this is way too expensive at Amazon for $5.50 per pack.

Bought this as a gift for my friend Zoey in Florida.  She absolutely loves cocowawa, and Vita Coco is among the 2 brands she enjoys the most. Keeps her in top condition whether replenishing after running 5k, or preparing for Clinky Drinky Friday nights.  Rare is the time you will find Zoey without a refreshing cocowawa close at hand. If it's good enough for Zoey, its good enough for any goddess, god, or mere mortal.

Summary: best coco water, perfect family size
Text:
vita coco tastes almost like plucking coconuts from tree and drinking fresh. if you have never experienced coconut water before, certainly drink it very chilled.
i found this 34oz resealable package to be ideal for my family (my husband and daughters are addicted to vita coco). 34 oz feeds them for 2 days (if that) and is less waste than having to throw out several of the smaller 11 oz sizes.
next purchase will be the 17oz size.
It has a bit of sour taste to it. Definitely not the best I ever had. I prefer O.N.E. much more.

Summary: Vita Coco 100% Pure Coconut Water, 34-Ounce Boxes (Pack of 6)
Text: this product tasted rancid it seem like a lower in product was able to camouflage with Hawaiian Punch and lots of ice. I do not believe I'll ever ordered again was very disappointed. Expected better quality for the price found it Fred Meyers cheaper and fresher.

Summary: Not a fan of the flavor...
Text: I've had many other coconut waters, all of which had added flavor.  But this one I can't choke down....I like the others I've had, I really don't like this one!

I LOVE coconut water.  I drink it every day.  This is the worst kind.  It just doesn't taste right at all.  Amy and Brians or ONE are much better.  Even the cheap Tasco brand is better than this.  Do not buy this... please Amazon start carrying Amy and Brians or try to keep ONE in stock.  They keep putting this on sale because its NOT GOOD!
This pesto was a lot more bitter than others that I have had and made. I didn't expect that but it was still enjoyable. I do not recommend it with whole grain pasta.

This pesto is certainly edible. I like it, but it does not make the meal an eating experience like some other pestos. We bought it to save some money, but we went back to the more expensive brand afterward.

If my dog could review this product, she'd give it 5 stars. She obviously loves the bacon flavor and being a very licky puppy, this is a real treat for her. As the pet owner, I like that she seems so content with the product, but it's a non-traditional way of delivering a treat and seems a bit awkward. The treat is given through a roll-on ball, like the old deodorants. With little treat bites, you can reward a dog with one or two nibbles, but regulating the number of licks or the time they're allowed to lick doesn't work so well. For training purposes, I wouldn't recommend this product, but just for gratuitous treat giving, I think it's just fine.

Summary: MY DOGS DIDN'T LIKE THIS AT ALL!!
Text: I tried this product on my dogs 3 times and each time, they would not touch it!  Admittedly, my dogs are picky, but no even one of them would try it.  They would walk up and sniff it, but they would not even taste it.  My dogs (3) are all small dogs and don't eat a lot of food.  Maybe if your dog is larger or less picky, it would appeal, but I can't say I would recommend this product.

My dog is small and loves loves treats. But treats she can toss in the air and run around with. She couldn't get the idea this was just a taste. She really thought at some point I would give up and give her the bottle. I am passing it on to a friend who is trying to train her dog not to pull on the leash. I realize this is a training tool but my dog didn't seem to think so. She did like the taste.

Summary: Smells Super; Our Dogs Have no Taste Appreciation
Text: I reluctantly give this a 3 due mainly to the smell of the Liver Flavor.  The sole purpose of the product is to offer a flavorful break from the ordinary dog food flavors they normally receive but alas both picky Yorkies refused on several occasions to even take a good whiff.  They love freeze dried livers from chickens, beef, pig and lamb but cannot stand Lickety Stik.  Just to test the situation I tried the Stik first and it was a resounding NO.  Then after they had freeze dried livers and again it was NO.  I took their favorite dry food and applied a small amount on several pieces and mixed them in with untreated food.
