Lurid...weak, chemical tasting all describes this K-Cup. French Vanilla is not the best flavor but Van Houttes makes it seem like the worst. If you like weak, chem-tasting coffee then you will love this!
I love this French Vanilla coffee. It's not over powering but still has a great vanilla flavor. My husband and teenage kids love it also. It's a household favorite!!
Not as impressed with brand of coffee.  It was very weak with the flavor. I would recommend the Green Mountain French Vanilla.

Coffee is OK. There are better French Vanilla coffee companies (this is weak flavored)
3 stars as only 18 cups (NOT 24 cups per box)

The French Vanilla is wonderful. This is our first time and it is wonderful. My wife loves flavored coffees, so, this was just a natural way to go.
We both enjoy a coffee in the morning and one when entertaining some evenings.
These k-cups are perfect for entertaining and fast perks. Enjoy!!!

Summary: Good but a bit strong to taste....
Text: Personally, I prefer the decaffeinated brands by this manufacturer but it was good for the price!

I received two of these in a sampler package I had ordered through Keurig.com I made one cup, added my Coffeemate and Splenda...and...EWW! It was so bad I poured the rest down the sink and threw away the other K-Cup. I will not be ordering this variety EVER.

I love this French Vanilla.  For those of us who don't want our coffee stripping the paint off the walls this is perfect. I always add water to my coffee, just my preference as most are way too strong. The vanilla is not over powering and the blend produces a great light roasted cup of coffee.  My favorite.  If you like "BOLD, DARK ROAST" then this one isn't for you.
The item I purchased was delivered in a timely manner and was available at a good price.  The shipping cost seemed a bit high, but the product was fresh and received in good condition.
THE half turkey we served for thanksgiving was fantastic very tender and moist would buy again and again

I've been on a quest for the perfect homemade wings sauce and couldn't come up with it using different recipes.  Then I bought this sauce and bingo, great! Use it with the Hooters wing coating.  It gives the outside of the wings the same kind of texture you get at the real Hooters.

Summary: Quality as you would expect from Hooters...
Text: Good wing sauce had a bbq and everyone one ate the drum sticks right up. Best of all the sauce says its Medium and tastes even milder to me. More of a buttery flavor base. I get heart burn really bad and am not a big fan of super spicy sauces. So this was right up my alley and made everyone happy. Try it out good quality product.

I love this product! It works! I have been using it for about a month now and I have lost 10 lbs I just need 5 more pounds to reach my goal (size 5 jeans)! It does exactly what it says it's supposed to do. I received it when they said I would :)

Summary: Love this tea and this is the best flavor!
Text: This is a great tea and the Ultra Chai is my favorite flavor!  I have a cup every morning and take it on trips--I am never without it.  The tea is incidental to my weight loss, I am sure, but just for full disclosure, I adopted a low-fat plant-based diet at the same time I started drinking this daily and I have lost 100 pounds.  I just love the flavor and love this tea!

This is a great tasting tea.  I use one bag for my 16oz commuter cup each morning.  I started ordering it online when the supermarket price went up rapidly and now...the cost has doubled since the first time I ordered it in 2009. I am assessing whether it is that good.

I just LOVE the BONKERS SUPER SKINNY CHAI TEA. It tastes so good. I have been drinking it for about a year now. I have not seen a big weight loss but have stayed the same weight. I don't know if tit really works I just love how good it tastes

I am Italian and have a son with gluten issues. I've tried all types of pasta and this is my favorite. The all-rice brands seem gloppy and bland. This, to me, had the best flavor and consistency. I even eat it - al dente, of course.

Summary: One of the best GF pastas out there
Text: My son used to only eat the Penne by Bi-Aglut, but once they stopped importing it, we were screwed.  We tried numerous brands and he didn't like any of them until we switched to Orgran.  We buy a box about every month or so.  I only wish they allowed you to put this on the subscribe program so we could get a break on the price.

My cat normally loves and reacts strongly to catnip.  I've used a spray catnip before and he rolled and played.  However, when I spray this on his toys or his rug there is no reaction at alll.  I finally threw the bottle away.

Summary: You know what I haven't had in a while?
Text:
Big League Chew.

True Story: I was addicted to Big League Chew. Almost destroyed my life until I checked myself into the clinic. What a reality-check. The therapist slapped me in the face for even thinking of kicking my Big League Chew habit.

The product description reads, "Target consumer: Boys 6-12 with an active interest in baseball" but declines to mention the rock-star status one receives upon bringing a box of Big League chew to work. Since I brought the box to work this morning, I've since been promoted nine times, from mail-room drone to Executive Director of Awesome.

Summary: Good product, wish for a better seller though...
Text: The product arrived on time and was the correct flavor type.  There was a problem though; when I opened the brown shipping box, it looked like whoever shipped it opened up my product and took out one of the pouches (it was a 12-pouch pack, the kind you would set up in a grocery store).  I also ordered a different flavor at the same time from the same company, and that box was also missing a pouch.  So in total, I was screwed out of 2 pouches of gum.  I didn't bother sending the product back or complaining because let's face it, the trouble wasn't worth the $2 that the gum was worth.  But still, kind of disappointing that someone would steal from their customer.

Summary: LOVE THE PRICE, THE SHIPPING, AND THE ITEM
Text: So I buy this item on amazon in every flavor probably once a month for my husband cause he loves this gum and it is super hard to find and it is usually expensive. Why I go throught the trouble of buying gum online you might ask?! well, it is way cheaper - I always buy two packs at a time and get the free shipping! - and I get a great selection of all the flavors! I am sure I have reviewed all the flavors by now hehehe love it!

Summary: Wild Pitch Watermelon Big League Chew.
Text: This stuff was pretty good.  I like the flavor and it came fairly quickly.  Gum was very fresh.

Summary: One word to describe this item... Disgusting!
Text: I like the original flavored Big league chew gum and decided to buy this but this flavor is just gross.  I still have 8 packs left after giving away a few to my friends who did not enjoy it either.  Amazon did great on their part but this gum is just disgusting... stay away and don't buy this!

This cooks and tastes like regular wheat pasta.  It is a bit firmer so no worries about ending up with mushy pasta.  The kids didn't even notice it was Quinoa.  They eat it with just a bit of butter and pepper.  So far we have used it with marinara but I am sure it will work great with lighter sauces.

Summary: Excellent product at an amazing price!
Text: I have been using Olive Oil for cooking for several years and this was my first Crisco product in a long time.  The price is for 3 bottles that are a great size for the cabinet.

Compared to other sugar free candies this candy has little taste of the fruit or of the sweet.
It is not worth the value.

The zylitol hard candies are delicious and have a nice variety of flavors. They were recommended to me by my dentist to help promote saliva production in my dry mouth which will help prevent cavities. I would recommend this product and the amazon web site to others.

Quite simply one of the best teas I've ever had. I've tried a few other varieties of chai, including Twinnings Apple-Chai, Dunkin Donuts bad rendition of chai, etc. This tea has so much depth, and so much spice in it that the bag is a little greasy. The smell that wafts from this Chai is absolutely heavenly.

I love making Bangalore/Bombay Fogs with this tea. (That is: make a chai concentrate using the tea and one shot/two tbsp of hot water, and then adding 16 oz of hot milk. I finish my fogs with vanilla creamer, for an extra rich taste that vanilla syrup just doesn't have.)

Have fun~!

Summary: Pretty darn good, could use a little more kick
Text: As a lover of pickled eggs, these were satisfying. The large quantity was great for the camping trip I took, and the eggs kept well, even in high heat. My only minor complaint is that the pickled taste itself is a little mild and could use a little more kick. Perhaps some hot red peppers!
I bought the mint chocolate and banana coconut to use in shakes.  They both were very delicious.  Shipping was quick, ordered on the 23rd and received on the 26th.

Use all flavors to flavor food without calories and sugar.  Tastes great, but you MUST be careful on pricing.  I only paid $2.99 per bottle and at the time of writing this, the price is now $6.95.  Consumer beware!

Summary: A favorite flavor, a little goes quite a ways
Text: I bought this to flavor margaritas.  I didn't need much of the flavoring to have the effect (taste) that I wanted.

This flavoring smells amazing; I bought it to make homemade Bubblegum Ice Cream just like I used to get from Dipper Dan's Ice Cream Parlor when I was a child.  Ordered this but didn't get to make any icecream during the holidays.  Hope to make some soon.  It smells just like bubblegum & I am sure it tastes like bubblegum in recipes.  Thank you so much.  Sincerely, RL

Perhaps it's because I live in northern Canada (although that shouldn't be an excuse), but it took a few days for the product to be shipped. Once, however, it was, it arrive on the last day of the projected delivery day.

No complaints.
Bought it for the ice cream maker which did not make ice cream since then sitting in the fridge.

Summary: Great, especially for those with MSG sensitivities!
Text: I am very sensitive to MSG and all its derivatives (yeast extract, etc).  This is the only Cream of Mushroom soup I have ever found that does not have yeast extract in it or MSG.  Even other "organic" cream of mushroom soups contain yeast extract.  I had to give up some of my favorite recipes because I couldn't find a cream of mushroom soup that didn't cause me to have my "MSG headaches."  Well not any more.  I can enjoy all my favorite recipes again!  This soup is great tasting and adds wonderful flavor to my recipes.  I even love how it comes in a carton rather than a can.  The quality of the soup is great and the ingredients are all natrual.  I would highly recommend this to anyone who has MSG sensitivities or who is just looking to add more great tasting natural ingredients to their recipes.

The Pacific Brand "Cream of" soups are a great replacement for those to have to go gluten free.  The taste is as good or better than the traditional condensed soups.  The only reason it's four stars is that most often, you must add some GF flour or other GF thickener as it can be a tish on the thin side (compared to traditional soups).  Will buy this again and again and so thankful to have found a GF version that is high quality and tastes just as good, if not BETTER!

The taste and quality of this soup is far superior to the stuff in the famous red can and white can but without all the unpronouncable ingredients.  We originally bought this because it was the only cream of mushroom soup without soy.  Not only am I allergic to soy but it is so unhealthy it should be avoided by everyone if at all possible.  One thing to be aware of is that this is a 12 ounce box whereas the name brand cans are only 8 ounces so when comparing prices remember that these are 50% larger than the other guys and you'll need to adjust your receipes accordingly.

If you're looking for a Campbell's cream of mushroom soup substitute, this isn't it. It doesn't have the milky-creamy consistency of Campbell's. It has a sour taste, from the cultured cream and whey. The broth is transparent. The pieces of mushroom are bigger. It's really nothing like Campbell's in taste or appearance. It's definitely much, much healthier, but I don't like the taste or texture and won't be buying it again. I'll be making my own cream of mushroom soup from now on.

This soup has a strong garlic flavor that I love in recipes.  Lots of delicious mushroom bits, too.  The soup blends easily with milk without the "fatty clumps" typical of Campbell's and many other brands.  The container is tricky to open at first -- you have to pinch the box flat on top, then tear off a strip.

Summary: Just the best mushroom soup ever
Text:
This soup is incredible. It's concentrated so not as heavy and bulky as other soups that are basically just costing you more money to ship around filtered water. The price is great.

Pros:

Taste is incredible.
Concentrated and thus not as bulky.

Cons:

None really.

This is the only soy-free brand of soup I've been able to find, and I'm thrilled to have it for casseroles and other recipes. I'm unable to give it 5 stars, however, because of the strong garlic flavor. I LOVE garlic, but it's not always a welcome addition to my recipes, like chicken casserole (this is true of their Cream of Chicken soup, too). Still, I can live with the garlic taste if it means avoiding an allergic reaction!

A 12 ounce box contains 1,900 mg of sodium (based on the nutrition info label) which is IMHO too much. The salty taste really is noticeable.  I realize soups in general are high salt but this is a lot for a 12 ounce serving.  Other than the salty taste the texture was decent - the amount of mushrooms was not.

It's hard to find great tasting gluten free soup, but we found it!  It's great to add to lean beef, vegetable soups, makes cooking a lot easier.  This tastes better than Campbell's mushroom soup.  Cheaper on Amazon, for sure!

Summary: My favorite of all the Pacific flavors
Text: This is a great side; if you are considering a a brand like Campbell's or Progressive, please give this flavor and brand a try -- very unprocessed, fresh taste with real flavor!

Summary: Thank you Pacific, for the return of the hotdish!
Text:
This product allows individuals who are restricted from having gluten and msg in their food, to have traditional dishes using Cream of Mushroom soup.
This product is in condensed form and is perfect for cooking. Never mind the pale color...the taste is all there and your recipes will be delicious.

Thanks for the return of the hotdish, Pacific!

Equally enjoyable is their Cream of Chicken....yum.

High marks for PN's quality of ingredients. Except for too much salt, the Pacific Natural ingredient list reads pretty close to how I'd make a homemade batch if I had the time. (FWIW, the red & white canned brand is even higher sodium).

As for the salt, one package of the PN packs 2220 mg of sodium - pretty much 100% of the RDA. I find it ironic that Pacific Natural would make this mistake, given that presumably most people buying an organic soup are probably more health conscious than those who do not. As others have noted, this soup is also more garlicky than one might expect a mushroom soup to be. I've found adding some onion powder (unsalted!) and fresh ground pepper offsets the garlic. I wish PN would do this - cut waaay back on the salt and add a bit of onion powder and black pepper to replace some of the garlic. And more mushrooms would be nice.

Despite the cons, I prefer the healthier PN brand to the red & white canned stuff. I had given up on having condensed cream of mushroom on hand so was thrilled when I found this brand. It works well in recipes calling for condensed soup, serves as a good gravy base, and makes a nice traditional cup of soup as well.

Summary: Not your typical can of cream of mushroom.
Text:
I feel like this soup is an 'upscale' version of your grocery canned cream of mushroom. We subscribe to this product, so it tells you we really like it!

1. I like that the container is environmentally friendly and no concern over BPA.
2. It's gluten free.
3. It's thick and creamy, works well as a substitute for other cream of mushroom soup recipes.
4. Organic! This was a big thing for us as well.

This product does have a strong flavor. It may take you a while to get used to it if you are used to the typical can of COM. The first time I used it for green bean casserole I was appalled. After getting used to the difference and not comparing it - it's a great option. This also is delicious in tuna noodle casserole. I haven't tried it as a soup alone, so I don't have a review for that.
Not bad.  On a low carb diet and it had more carbs than I thought it would.  18 per serving.  I will probably switch back to Campbells.

I love garlic; in tomato sauce, on braised dishes and elsewhere. I can handle garlic when I expect it. I didn't expect it here. At least not in this strength. I guess I'll have to go back to the red & white cans.
Hey! You may like it. Not for me.
I used one and threw the rest out.

Summary: Not as good as other Pacific soups
Text: I love Pacific Natural Foods organic soups, especially the creamy tomatoes and butternut squash. But this cream of mushroom soup has no flavor at all. I went with the 12-pack based on my confidence in the brand. Now I am stuck with 11 packs of bad soups.

Summary: Fromm Gold is the best food for our dogs!
Text: We have a boxer (skin allergies, etc.) and a boxer/beagle mix (thicker coat than the boxer) that both love Fromm Gold Large Breed food! We tried every top brand of grain-free food (Orijen, Instinct, Wellness, etc) and experienced horrible gas in both of our dogs...so bad that  we kept cans of febreeze in every main room of our home. We started going to a new groomer at a pet supply store near us and they recommended Fromm. The store said Fromm is a family owned company with NO food recalls since opening their business in 1904. We buy our food locally, not from Amazon(we are avid Amazon shoppers in other departments), but I felt compelled to write a review to potentially help other consumers find this amazing dog food. We are on our 6th bag of Fromm and both of our dogs have beautiful coats, are maintaining healthy weights and are totally gas free! There are not enough positive words to say about this food!!

My two great danes eat this. It is high quality food and they seem to love the taste. We had a problem with very loose stools and this food has helped immensely. Check around for prices. Sometimes it is cheaper on line and sometimes in your local feed store.

Our German Shepherd was a picky eater until we switched to Fromm dry dog food. Our Golden retriever had skin issues as well but cleared up once we switched to Fromm's. They are 100% USA sourced as well.  Highly recommend.
I bought this due to my dog seeming to have a food allergy to corn and grains. He eats it and seems to enjoy it so time will tell if this solves his skin problems.
This food was recommended by my dog's breeder and my dog, a Golden Retriever puppy, is thriving.

Summary: Who knew milk chocolate could be this good?
Text:
I'm a big fan of dark chocolate. Given the choice, I'll always buy the dark semi-sweet chocolate version of anything.

We don't buy brownies all that often - they're kind of a once-a-month thing. But when my local supermarket had a super-sale on the Duncan Hines brownies for 77 cents a box (!!!!), we stocked up a little. We got the Chewy Fudge style, the Chocolate Lovers style, and what the heck, since they're only 77 cents, let's get a box of the Milk Chocolate. We left that for last because I assumed it would be pretty tame.

O.M.G.

When my wife and I ate them, we both just looked at each other in surprise. How could these be so much better than the other flavors? I mean, it's just milk chocolate, for cryin' out loud! Milk chocolate is like "toy chocolate", made for people without the fortitude for real chocolate.

So now we've got a $2.50/box substance abuse problem, hoping and praying for another 77 cent sale.

Summary: Love the product, but not the price
Text: My family has been eating the milk chocolate duncan hines brownies for a couple of years now and absolutely love the them!  Duncan hines brownie & cake mixes are the best.  But, I can buy the brownie mixes at my local Wal Mart or sometimes Target for less than I purchased on Amazon.

White tea generally has a delicate flavor, but this tea has a more distinct "straw" flavor that you might like--or not.  I notice that this particular brand is higher in caffeine than the white teas from Republic of Teas.  The latter has a more subtle flavor as well.
my two Golden Retrievers loved these -- AND they kept them busy longer than other chews.  A bit expensive, so they will not get them often, but they WILL get them again.

My dog (A silken windhound) loves any and all rawhide, any and all bones to be truthful. But she injured a tooth once cracking through a beef knuckle bone, and I have since stopped providing her with hard bones. My dog has no interest at all in toys, unless there is a treat in it, then she pulls out the treat in 5 minutes and ignores the toy from then on. So I sought out rawhides as something to engage her off and on during the day. Though she'll chew eagerly on any rawhide I give her, I worry about her choking or gagging on a large hunk of it stuck in her throat, or a large piece getting stuck in her gut. This piggy twist, because it has such tight skinny strands, does not have that risk. On top of that,she'll take nearly two weeks of picking at it to finally finish it off, in spite of her persistance. I am so glad that she can have the rawhide she enjoys, that it doesn't get devoured in a day, and which allows me to feel safe giving it to her. I do wish I could get the 9 inch in a 3-5 pack.

This is my dogs favorite bone.  She is a Shiba Inu/Labrador mix and loves these bones.  All the dogs that come over all love this bone too!  Even though it's 9" any sized dog can chew on it because of the individual strands.

These were really quite hard for my teeth!  I was hoping they were the texture of the fruit snacks which are also real fruit, but super soft and chewy, but not sticking to my teeth.  These were chewy alright, but hard--think old licorice or JuJuBees that have sat out for a week.  Were they tasty?  Ok, but I couldn't really tell one flavor from another.  Did I eat them when I was sitting at work and wanted chips or chocolate?  Yes, they gave me something to chew.  And chew.  And chew.  My kids ate them too, but they eat anything and are not very picky at all.  I thought it was misleading when I saw the top three ingredients were corn syrup, sugar, and high fructose corn syrup.  Then fruit purees and finally caranauba wax.  Will not buy again.

Summary: Excellent flavor.  Liked by whole family.
Text: These Gummies are tasty.  No complaints from the kids.  Less guilt giving them real food sweets than the synthetic alternatives with all their preservatives and artifical ingredients.

These gummies are delicious. There are 6 different flavors in each bag and each flavor is distinct. Not only do they taste good, they also smell very good. The gummies are not hard like some other gummy candies that I've tried in the past. I purchased these for my family and they loved it. I would definitely recommend this as an alternative to other gummy candies.

I ordered this product specifically to make ramos gin fizzes. I have not used a competitors product to compare to this, but I was very pleased with the nuances that it adds to other cocktails as well.

Summary: Great Energy Mix but price is too high!
Text: I have a similar product that I purchased at Wal-Mart for less than $5 for 19.25 oz., so this price is way too high.  The product currently comes with 20% free, so it probably is usually available in a 16 oz. size.  The product that I purchased is called Ann's House "Good Health Energy", but it appears to be a similar mix of soynuts, cranberries, almonds and pumpkin kernels.  A 1/4 serving provides 8 grams of fat, 6 grams of sugar, 3 grams of fiber and 7 grams of protein.  There are other mixes available including Macadamia Perfection, Cranberry Nut Antioxidant, Chocolate Nut Antioxidant, Creamy Strawberry Almond and Pistachio Perfection.  I did not see all of these at the store.  The product is very high quality and Ann's House has been in business since 1973.

Summary: Love the protein-packed snack, but Amazon's price is a rip-off!
Text: I stumbled on Ann's Soy Energy Blend at Costco about two months ago.  I've been buying two tubs every two weeks since.  My husband & teenage son won't touch it, but my toddler & I eat some every day.  I have to have protein to keep from shaking during the day & often I'm not even hungry enough to eat anything, so the Soy Energy Blend makes a perfect snack that gives me the boost I need without making me feel like I overate.  It's also a great movie night guilt-free snack.  I know the soy nuts can seem bland, but they've honestly grown on me.  Whereas I used to pick out the cranberries & almonds first, now I only eat about half of those, letting my toddler pick them out for herself instead.  Now, the reason I'm here.  I ran out yesterday & made a special trip to Costco today for more.  They're all sold out!  I did an online search to see if I could find them anywhere else in my area & found them here.  But $22.00?!  Seriously? I pay just under $7 for the 36oz tub at Costco!  If they don't start carrying them again I'll have to start buying the items in bulk & making my own mix.  Cause this price is simply outrageous.  UPDATE:  February 2012 - Costco has them back in stock!  $6.99 a tub.  It's the first aisle I check every trip and today I bought 4 tubs.  :)

Ann's House Soy Energy Blend is fantastic. First, a word about price: Costco carries Ann's at the moment, but you know Costco- that could change, however, at Costco, I think it's cheaper by about half over some of the sites I've seen. Secondly- this stuff is dynamite! I bought Ann's for work precisely because I didn't want something that tastes "too good", i.e. trail mixes or candy that are full of fat, sugars, salts, and chocolate. Ann's is not sweet, but the cranberries, pumpkin seeds and occasional almond adds ample taste-appeal to the protein-packed soy. When in a captive environment like work, nibbling Ann's Energy Mix is good for you and super satisfying for the deep hunger that usually only meats, or peanut butter can fix. And, you will not even be aware of the benefit until 5 minutes after eating a handful or two. The satisfaction overcomes hunger and there is no guilt. Men may trip about soy and phytoestrogens, but the amount you're likely to eat will not affect any man. Hey- do they have a problem making babies in Asian countries where soy is their staple? Right! Get on with it then!

Summary: Great snack on the go or at the office
Text:
I bought this at the local Costco, where, as others have mentioned, it is much cheaper there than here on Amazon. At first, I was hesitant to purchase, as I had bought a giant canister of soy nuts once and found that they were completely bland and left me with cottonmouth and a bad aftertaste. I had a hard time even giving them away in the office. So after comparing the label on the Energy Mix with several other nut & trail mixes, I found this mix to be the healthiest by far. Per 1/4 cup serving, there are 8g fat, 3g fiber, 6g sugar(!), 0g sodium(!), and 7g protein. As you can see, there is plenty of fiber and protein, no added salt, and the only sugar comes from the dried cranberries. This is a big difference from other nut/trail mixes which might have a good amount of salt and/or sugar added. That is what makes this Energy Mix a great, guilt-free snack for when you're stuck at your desk at work and feel bad about quaffing down M&M-laden trail mix to stave off your hunger. I usually go for a run or surf after work, so I toss back a couple handfuls of the energy mix before leaving the office, and find that it gives me just the right energy fix to make it through a hard workout, and all the way to dinner.

And the taste: well like I said, I'm not a huge fan of soy nuts, but just the right amount of dried cranberries are added to balance out the dry blandness of the soy nuts. Throw in the almonds and pumpkin seeds and you've got a good, nutty taste to round things out. I will say that if you are looking for bold flavor or to satisfy your sweet tooth/salt craving, then you will be let down. But if you are looking for a good tasting, satisfying snack that you can nibble on all day without feeling guilty, then this is a perfect choice.

This is a Great Product. I would like to ask Keith S Francis where he got his so call information that the Soy Energy was not safe under FDA guidelines. If that were true it would not be allowed to be sold in the stores. It is available in COSTCO all the time. I just purchased four 36 oz containers today at costco for $7.79 per container. I also contacted the FDA and was informed that there is no truth to your posting as to the safety. Not all COSTCO's purchase the same products. It is available everyday here in California and at $7.79 per 36oz container it is very reasonably priced. The 22.00 per container price is high but the vendors on AMAZON can ask any price they want we just don't have to buy from them.

Summary: Might be a bit bland for some folks...
Text:
But with zero sodium in it I consider that a fair trade-off. Being one of those not-so-lucky folks who have blood sugar issues, I've been told that soy is a good way of getting one's protein, and when I saw this at the big warehouse store I decided to give it a try. I like the almonds and cranberries the best (although those do have sugar so I take it easy), and yes the soy nuts are not so flavorful and might not appeal to all. I see mention in another review about the pumpkin seeds coming from China, a valid concern, but I've been snacking on these for a few weeks and haven't seen any ill effects yet :)

In the end, it is all about choice - and there are plenty of trail mixes and nut mixes out there packed with sodium. Your call, but as long as the big warehouse store carries this I'll keep on buying and snacking. I also took some into work and gave a sample to two healthier choice minded co-workers and they both liked it as well.

I bought this Soy blend at Cosco for under $8 and would probably pay up to $10 for it...but this is ridiculous! It is a good blend, tasty and healthy. Too bad. I will not search it out, especially at this price. I would definitely buy it every other week or so, if it came back to Cosco, at a similar price.

Found this at costco while visiting my brother in Phoenix Az. As one of the other reviewers said this works for me being a Type 2 Diabetic it is easy on the blood sugar and zero sodium is a winner in my book and tastes good also. But the price hear is wacked as $7 bucks at costco is a great deal. I have not been able to find it in my local costco here in the Seattle area but will request it !

Recently, I picked up a 30-ounce plastic jar of "Ann's House Soy Energy Blend" which I discovered in the snack isles of my local Costco warehouse store. It's a mixture of soy nuts, almonds, pumpkin seeds and dried cranberries. I'm a sucker for things like this. I can use them as a healthy snack. I can pack them in little sandwich bags and include them in my lunch package. I can bag them up for snacks in hiking walks. My wife likes them too. We snack now and then but we try to avoid salty and sweet snacks and stick to things that are nutritionally sound. These things fit the bill. They're a little bland tasting and you might wish that they were salted at least a little bit, but the protein and fiber content will make up for any taste deficits, at least in my book. It's a good snack. I love discovering things like this!

Gary Peterson

I brough mine in Costco is cheap there for only like $7. compare to $20+ amazon charge, is great snack, has NO Soldium and lower fat content since is made up like 50-60% soy nuts.  Just careful at portion size, this are great snacks in my opinion.

Summary: GREAT taste, but priced too high!
Text: My family loves this product, however I can purchase the same brand, same 36oz size at a local store for less than $8.00. Great with a cold beer during a game. Try it, you'll enjoy it I am sure :)

Summary: Awesome product--Costco should keep it on their sheves forever!
Text: This soy energy blend is the best thing to put on salads or add to Chex cerel for a healthy trail mix.

This is the best blend of healthy snacks I have found without the typical high sodium content. Cranberries add some sweetness that makes it a perfect midafternoon pick-me-up! Used to be carried by a warehouse retailer, but no more.  I am thrilled to have found it on Amazon!
I use to purchase this product at Costco for half the price,although I really like the product it's too expensive..
could not find this at the store this year. so was very happy to find it here with amazon. ordered it and it came quickly. this is a great snack or on salads.thanks
This product is addictive. Sprinkle it on your oatmeal or just eat it from the container. The soy nuts are a bit dry but delicious none the less. Glad that I found it on Amazon.
This is a great snack anytime of the day. I tastes good and is good for you. No sodium or cholesterol and all natural. It is also a great pick me up for the late afternoon.
This snack is highly nutritious and great tasting.  Amazon's price is far too high.  I buy the identical product at Costco for $7.79.

Summary: Review of Ann's Houise Soy Energy Blend
Text: We enjoy Ann's House Soy Energy Blend.  We started buying it at Costco, but they stopped selling it and started selling Ann's House Edamame.  We like the Soy Energy Blend so much better.  It is good and apparently healthy for you.

Summary: This is my new favorite energy snack
Text: I found a 9oz version of Ann's House Healthy Energy Blend. I really liked it and wanted to purchase more, but wasn't sure what store I found it in. I checked Ann's House web site and found that Walmart supposedly carried it.  I did not find it at Walmart, so I decided to order some online.  I couldn't find the 9oz version online, so I ordered Ann's House Soy Energy Blend 36oz value container.  I was hoping it was the same blend, just with a different name.  Since I saved the 9oz packaging, I could compare the ingredients and it seems to be exactly the same.  Boy was I happy to have 36oz of this good snack.  All the ingredients are really fresh (soy nuts usually seems to get stale quickly).  LOVE, LOVE, LOVE this snack.  Thank you Ann's House!

For a fatty like myself it's hard to keep from gobbling up a bunch of garbage... This stuff keeps me relatively satiated for several hours with a single serving...

Costco has the same container, same brand, same product for 9 bucks.
I love this mix! $19.99 seemed high and I checked our Costco receipt. $7.69 for the same 36 ounce size. Enough said.
What can I say....its a great snack type food that curbs your appetite. Can find it cheaper elsewhere but good on here when in a pinch.

Wow this stuff is addictive and energizing. We can't stop eating it! My girlfriend has gained 30lbs. She is a vegetarian and this is her new favorite protein! We have a pig and today he climbed on the chair to eat them because he loves them too! Also her cousin is in the CIA and says this is what secret agents eat while they are on missions. Highly recommended for Y2k/2012 end times.

Received this in a gift basket, it tastes good but.....and it is a BIG BUT.....look on the ingredients listed and the pumpkin seeds in the mix are imported from China.??  I apologize and hope I don't offend but I refuse to give my children untested food imported from China given the current manufacturing problems they have had over there with toxins and chemicals placed in food products (I.E.  baby formula)  These must be extremely cheap pumpkin seeds to warrant this which makes me nervous, why else import them from China and not use USA pumkin seeds?  Sorry, will take a closer look at all ingredients from "Anna"s House" in the future.

I fell in LOVE with this product while visiting my Son in Honolulu, he purchases this at Cosco. As soon as I arrived back to the midwest I called EVERY Costco and requested and researched as to why this Cost's SO much on line and is unavailable in the Midwest or any Markets.

It would apear this product is NOT safe under the USDA guidelines and this to be the reason for a HUGE cost Increase on line and the reason it is Unavailable in the stores normally found in.

WHAT a SHAME ! ! ! I found a greater Energy prior to my daily Yoga and after my daily hygiene regimine for the day while eating this Mix. I would think this company; "Anne's House" would find a substitute to replace the requests for thier product. If this product is not safe under the guidelines of the FDA it should have been found before ever allowed to be placed on the shelves in the USA.

I WISH I could find A Substiture Product as good Anne's House Soy Energy Blend that is Safe and is Reasonably priced on the shelves in the USA once again.

The bulk of this product is soy nuts which is pretty much inedible. I tried a few and they are tasteless and bland. I put some out for the squirrels and birds. They ate the almonds and cranberries but left the soy nuts. Even my dog won't eat them and he eats horse manure! Out of the 36oz in the package there's probably 25oz of soynuts that I can't even give away. Waste of money.

This is the richest most milk-like rice beverage and the label on it does not mention canola oil, which contains up to 2% toxic erucic acid and is found in many rice beverages that are fed to children! Canola oil cannot be used by US FDA regulation in infant food. (One research paper found higher levels of erucic acid in red blood cells of autistic children compared to non-autistic children, and there are many other well established toxic effects of erucic acid in humans and animals. Look in the medical journals.)

This product is sold in my neighborhood Ralph's (best price), VC discount, and Whole Foods in Los Angeles.

The 365 brand (Whole Foods own brand) is also canola-free. It is much cheaper but watery in comparison. I use it for cooking.

West Soy Rice beverage is also canola free. It has a more neutral taste and less body.

Many people find rice milk better tasting than other milk substitutes. I find it to be much easier to digest than soy and nut products. Soy milk, however, has much more protein. Aside from being hard to digest, I don't eat too much soy because of the anti-nutritional components; so I get my protein elsewhere.

The chocolate flavor is really great tasting, too.
Add to water, stir and voila! Delicious slightly tart cherry drink for those times when you want to be refreshed, but also want a bit of flavor to your water.

Summary: Good Coffee, Not a Great Coffee
Text: First, I have to confess that I expected this Kona blend to knock my socks off.  It didn't do that, or even come close to it, but it is a perfectly adequate coffee even if it is not what I would call a great coffee.  It is very mild, not bitter, and can be made in various strengths according to individual preference with no bitter after-taste.  I don't feel that I wasted my money but I am not sure I shall buy Jeremiah's Kona Blend again.

My wife and I have slightly different tasates in coffee, I like mine darker and she like a milder coffee.  This one however is just right for both of us.  I drink it daily without cream or sugar (which I only do when I actually enjoy the flavor of the coffee).  And we are on our second 5 pound bag!  I wish we had found this coffee sooner, it is great.

I like a good cup of Joe and when our friends turned us on to Kona coffee we were instant fans.  But the cost was killing us.  So when I saw that Amazon had their new grocery line I was on it checking out their price.  This is a great cup of Kona for the price.  I hate bitter coffee - this is smooth.

Jeremiah's Kona Blend is a good tasting, middle of the road coffee bean.  While not as flavorful as J's Fogbuster, the Kona is light and mellow, offering a nice change of pace for dark roast drinkers.  I brew in a french press most mornings, but when I ran it through a drip machine for company the flavor became too slight.  Be prepared to grind a lot of beans if you brew drip.  Overall a good pick and a good value.

This Kona blend has smooth flavor and good taste for the price.  I would definately consider buying this again as 100% Kona coffee is very expensive, so this makes for a nice compromise.  As long as you know that when you are purchasing this product that it is a blend, it is my belief that you won't be dissapointed.
I found Jeremiah's Pick Kona Blend lacking flavor. I tried every trick I know to bring out all the taste it had but still found it weak.
These beans produce a nice tasting brew. However, the beans look old and dry. After opening the bag, I immediately put them into 1 pound bags and froze, hoping to extend the life of the beans.
Great coffee from a familiar maker, this kona blend really rocks and the price is unbeatable anywhere!

We really liked Jeremiah's Pick Fogbusters coffee in the five pound whole bean package, so I ordered this one for a bit of variety. We're SO pleased!

Yes, it's a blend (what did you expect for the price?), but the mellow smoothness of the Kona really comes through and makes for an outstanding pot of coffee. Without the almost-bitter notes of the Fogbuster, this Kona blend is complex, rich and delicious.

For a 12 cup drip coffeemaker, I use two and a quarter coffee scoops of the beans and grind for 15 seconds. It's perfect, and way better than Maxwell House or Folgers. Highly recommended!
It took a long time for me to receive this coffee, but it was worth the wait! I'm spoiled now and I find that regular coffee is lacking in flavor.
It was a nice product with a value price what can I say but great job and thank you
Very happy with product. Roast is just like I like it, not too light, not too dark. Makes a nice cup of coffee with just enough of the Kona to make it enjoyable.

Summary: Makes an excellent, smooth, flavorful espresso shot
Text: The true test of a coffee's flavor for me is to drink it as espresso.  I've been roasting my own coffee for years, but mix it up sometimes by buying already roasted coffee.  This coffee has a great flavor with no bitter after taste when I drink a shot from my espresso machine.  When I drink it as regular coffee, I'll blend several of my favorite beans to get more complex flavors.  If you really want to find your favorite coffee, do a blind taste test.  It's fun and you might be surprised at which coffee you choose when your preconceived notions are taken out of the equation.
It is a great coffee, my husband and I bought 18 different coffee's made cappuccino, espresso and latte. This coffee is great for everything, no after taste or bitter residue.

This coffee is NOT what I expected! I have had Kona coffee before which was spectacular! I guess that is what I was looking for. But you will not find it here. This is a blend, and that is probably why. I will never buy this again!

We usually drink french roast coffee (San Francisco Bay) that we grind daily and we've been enjoying that kind of coffee for a while.  We were visiting friends and we were served coffee which tasted very good and it was a bit milder than what we drink, so I asked about the brand and was told it was Jermiah's Kona mixed with some french roast.  I ordered my bag from Amazon and the shipment was prompt and well packaged.  As for the coffee, it was terrible: stale, no aroma, beans were dry.  I figured that since I have the bag I might as well brew some and the result was undrinkable coffee.  I tried it by itself, mixed 1/2 french roast, 1/4 ...without any success.  I don't know if I got a stale bag or what, but my experience left me with a bad taste. Amazon was great and they offered a refund.  Thank you Amazon!

We were given a pound of kona as a gift and loved it so i was tasked with finding a coffee for everday use thaT tasted close. Well after looking at the cost per pound of what we were using, starbucks breakfest blend at 12.00 per lb and then buying this at around 8.00 per lb it was a no brainer. I don't know I didn't do this years ago.
I honestly can not tell the difference between the 100% kona and this blend and its priced at a little more than folgers?
I hate to put this reveiw out there for fear that the price of this and availablity will be affected.
SO HERE IT IS FOLKS. AS CLOSE TO 100% KONA AS YOU CAN GET AND CHEAPER THAN MOST A++++.

This coffee has a very nice rich flavor without being bitter or over powering.  I use it in my espresso machine and regular drip maker.  It is very good coffee although a bit pricey... but worth it to a coffee lover such as myself.

Been drinkin gormet coffee many years now, bunch of different brands and roasters. It's hard to beat the Coffee Fool for quality and freshness, but I've come back to this Jerimias' pick for the quality and the savings I get here at Amazon. Its a great value and superb freshness--you'll be very pleased!

Summary: Great Price - How Much Kona Coffee????
Text: Good product for the price.  It could be a little smoother which is what Kona is noted for.  Would like to know just how much Kona is in the 'blend'.  I don't think it is as much as when you buy it on amazon in one pound packages. Overall I'm still happy to have 5 pounds on hand.

I thought this blend was an excellent alternative to the regular coffee I buy. Jeremiah's Pick Fogbuster is my preferred coffee, however if you are not of fan of bold coffee and want a solid mild coffee...The Kona Blend is an excellent choice.

Summary: Burnt, with subtle tones of burnt
Text: I like my coffee black, but found this pretty much undrinkable without milk, and my office mates agreed.  It really does just taste charred.  I'm not sure if it's all like this or I just got a bad batch.  Anyways, the price isn't bad, but I can't recommend this to anyone.  I'm still looking for a good, reasonably priced 5lb bag.

Summary: Great coffee, great price...only wish it was offered as organic
Text:
This has been our new go-to coffee. It's got a balanced taste and smells great. Good price for the bag, too.

The only reason I gave it 4 stars is that I wish they offered it as an Organic option.

Summary: Great way to start the day!!
Text: This is great coffee.  I make 8 cups every day and we use extra when we have company.  I have a bag sent to me every month.  It is the best coffee.  I have had many compliments on it. I got a rubbermaid container that has a handle and pours and it holds the whole thing.  I grind the beans every night when I set up my machine and it is very fresh.  We like strong, but not bitter coffee and we drink it black no sugar.  This is rich full bodied but never bitter or acidic tasting.  I have been using it for over a year and I will continue to use it until they no longer sell it.  My in-laws like it so much I am planning to get them a subscription for Christmas.  We used to use Gevalia, but this is far superior and less than half the price. When I first ordered it I was afraid we would not like it because it was so cheap.  It is the cheapest stuff I have ever bought.  I only bought it because a reviewer that was reviewing a different coffee I planned to get recommended this instead.

Jeremiah's Pick Coffee Kona Blend, Whole Bean Coffee, I am addicted to it !!!  I buy it every time it even gets close to running out.  The folks at Jeremiah's Pick are very prompt and every order is right on time or early. Everyone has their own taste but as far as I am concerned , this is the best coffee I have ever drank !!!
The first time I ordered coffee, it was fresh and sealed tight. Second order the coffee wasn't as fresh. Good price though for bulk

I purchased this coffee because I tend to like Kona blends, but this is far from the best of the bunch.  I rate it average because that's how it tastes. Nothing there to make me want to purchase it again when I have tasted other brands that were better. Unfortunately a five pound bag will last a long time.

This is my first experience with Kona and I find it very flavorful.

Perhaps I'll examine more expensive types of Kona in the future, but right now this is priced right and delivers a good cup of joe.
These beans are so dry they crumble.  Horrible coffee.  Reminds me of the starbuck's beans you get at Walmart.  Yuck.  Avoid at all costs, they are not what they appear.
A lot of reviews say this coffee is smooth, my wife and I disagree.  We think it is very bitter.  We will not order these beans again but are open to trying other Jeremiah's products...

Valerian and Chamomile are blended with spearmint leaves, lemon grass, hawthorn berries and orange blossoms to create a delicious tea to savor late at night before you drift off into dreams.

This tea is much more effective than regular Sleepytime and I can say this because my sleep cycle has been fairly regular with much fewer nights of tossing and turning. You may also find that your mood the next day is rather mild and you feel more relaxed in general. This could be due to getting a good night's sleep for a change or it could be that the valerian has a lasting effect.

Valerian is a very effective herb if you can't get to sleep and this tea is highly recommended for insomnia. Unlike sleeping pills, you won't feel groggy the next morning. Blend in a little lavender or orange blossom honey to enhance this deliciously mild minty tea.

~The Rebecca Review

Long wait! I suppose it's my fault for ordering from the webstore as I am in CA and I think this comes from the east coast so it took forever to get here. My dog and I are loving this food so far. TMI but seriously, her poos are so small and barely smell. She liked it dry, which is kind of funny, but I do wet it sometimes. The feeding guidelines are a little ambiguous, so I plan to call Addiction directly. As for the store (Whole Health Pet, I believe), they are great! As I mentioned the wait was long, but I ordered from them twice and both times received a couple of samples and goodies for my dog; a sample packet of another grain-free Addiction flavor and a freeze dried meat treat - great attention to detail!

This is a great cereal.  My kids, grandkids, and I have been hooked on this since it came out.  We really like it in a big bowl with white...OR chocolate milk.  Kids don't usually like to drink the milk left after the cereal is gone?  No problem. The milk is delicious, also.  There are more marshmallow pieces than Lucky Charms and they are larger in size.  We usually get the big bag and it lasts...oh, maybe a week.  Try 'em.
This was a bit strong from what I am used to but after drinking it a few times the flavor was great. I was pleased.

What can I say My cat loves them so I assume they are pretty tasty.

I can't say for sure because I have really not tried them myself :)

My first exposure to Patchi choclates was in Abu Dhabi, where Patchi stores are found aplenty. Now that we are back in the States, Amazon is the only place I've been able to find Patchi. Hooray! The chocolates are as rich and delicious as I remember. If you have never enjoyed Patchi chocolates - do yourself a favor and buy some!
A small bag that was overpriced. The candy tasted fine and served its nostalgia purpose, but it would not be ordered again.

Summary: My Puppy & I love Holistic Select
Text: This puppy formula is great. I have a Rat Terrier puppy, Maggie who had problematic diarrhea with other canned puppy foods, especially ones with rice, even when I changed the brand slowly as recommended. However with Holistic Select,the diarrhea stopped and she has been fine for the last four weeks. The "Puppy Recipe" looks and smells good, like a real home cooked chicken dinner. She is happy and healthy and growing like a weed.

I purchased this puppy food for my friend who has an elderly, toothless poodle named Prissy. My friend was hand-feeding her, desperately trying just to get her to eat. Now with this food Prissy has an eager appetite on her own and also has gained some much needed weight. My friend considers this food to be a life-saver for her old girl.
My dogs seem to really like it. The ingredients are top of the line and this is a great food for dogs. I would recommend it.

Summary: Puppy has diarrhea after eating HS canned puppy food
Text: I had a German Shepherd puppy who had frequent diarrhea. Giardia and fecal tests at the Vet's always come up negative. I noticed that she had diarrhea whenever I fed her canned food. Since HS is a good brand and there are no recalls, I didn't think it would be the food. I recently adopted another puppy. She did not have diarrhea when I fed her HS Large breed puppy dry food. However, after I gave her some of the canned puppy food, she had bad diarrhea and started vomiting. I'm certain now that this canned food caused diarrhea in both my puppies.

The advertisement for this product is very misleading and accualy lies out right about what you are getting, it says you are getting 30 8oz packets of  mix when you are accualy getting 30- .5oz oz packets and because of the high price of $17 you are easily misled. The same amount of product at Walmart is approx. $5, around 30% of what this seller sold his for. RIP OFF!!!

Summary: Great Tasting Low Cal Product, Perfect for dieting.
Text:
-helping me loose weight because im not drinking soda, im drinking water and CRYSTAL LIGHT
-great tasting
-low cal
-Helps me to drink more water
-great for a single person who lives alone thats not making huge things of lemonade for kids, husband ect.
-portable and handy, you can make your drink on the go, were ever you can take a bottle of water you can take your drink mix too.

Love the product drink it with water almost every day!
This vinegar is outstanding!  Sweet and savory with mellow acidity. Great on salads and vegetables even pasta.  You will want to covet this vinegar, so buy one for your friends!

Is this really ceremony grade and organic? I don't think I should be the critic b/c I probably couldn't tell. I order items online all the time, but I wonder if this is the real deal. I drink it mostly for the health benefits and can't really tell if it's worth the money. The company website looks amateur and makes me question this product. However, it does taste good. Better when first brewed hot (not boiling) and then refrigerated or added to other cold foods/drinks.

Summary: Fan of all Greenies products- except this one.
Text:
Though my cat is a huge a fan of all of the Dental Chews produced by greenies, my experience with this product was less than pleasant.
This product did the opposite of what it set out to do. My cat violently vomited hairballs the same evening I fed him these. In fact, he couldn't digest them at all and has never thrown up so much at one time. This was unusual and still has me shocked, especially for an animal that regurgitates seldom and mildly. Be careful, as I wish I had.

First off, my cat HATES regular Greenies (the big crunchy ones) and won't even try to lick them. Any flavor. But my big fluffy Himalayan was hacking up stinky furballs in unreachable places, so when I saw these at the pet store I bought them on a whim.

She loves them! I don't think she even chews the things, she inhales them so fast. Tuna treats are ok but chicken were more popular around here. She likes these better than the Temptations treats she had before, and I am convinced that these are somewhat healthier.

The pouch recommends 12 treats a day, all at once, or even more for my big-boned cat. I usually do more like 5-6, because that many treats seems excessive (she would love it though). Either way, she hasn't had any hairballs since. I am not positive about the causal relationship, but I suspect these did the trick. They're great!

We have tried other greenies treats and other brands. Usually one cat likes one flavor/style and the other doesn't. Both of my adopted cats love these treats. If it were up to them they would eat these treats all day, every day!

Summary: cat loves these, even more than regular greenies
Text: My cat loves these. She is very small even though she is fully grown so the regular greenies just seemed uncomfortable for her to eat. I tried these and she LOVES THEM, even more than Temptation treats. I've never had problems with vomiting after these.
My cat likes these better than regular Greenies and has had no problem with hairballs or vomiting with this product.

Summary: not the same as they used to be
Text: My husband stumbled across the old version of these (2009?), and I adored them. Perfect, melt-in-your mouth peppermint stick. NOthing better. And then they changed the formula. He's gotten them for me the last two Christmas. And every year, I dare to hope they've gone back to the earlier formula, but alas, I've been sorely disappointed the last two years. They currently are not melt-in-your mouth, more of a suck and crunch, and then kinda gooey. I'll probably get them again, optimist that I am, in hopes they change the formula back to the grandeur it was.
Very pleased to finally find a real candy store. Very fast. We'll be back for more soon and thanks again.

This makes the best jello salad / dessert and I cannot find apricot jello in the stores in town.  Make jello as directed with 1 cup orange juice (heat to boiling).  Stir in 1 cup buttermilk and a box of apricot jello.  Store in the refrigerator.  This is divine.  The recipe easily doubles and triples.  Hope you enjoy.

I have been looking all over for this Jello.  My husband loves and cook and had me running all over town to find Apricot Jello.  My Grandson told me to check with you and we found it. Thank you so very much.  He now can try all the recepies he wants too.

Summary: Please don't stop carrying this Jell-O
Text: This is one of the best flavors that Jell-O makes.  I too could not find it locally except at one store (Brookshires in Texas).  Then I found it here at Amazon and was thrilled to be able to order it immediately.

We live just northwest of Houston. When I asked about getting this flavor of Jell-O at our local stores(even Wal-Mart!), I was told that even if they could get this flavor, it would be a long process.
I got on the internet and had the Jell-O delivered within a week.
For my needs, the availability of the product was my most important situation. The product itself was excellent and gave my salad the flavor that I was after.

Thank you very much,

Linda Mitchell
Unable to purchase this flavor in the local stores so had to order on-line. Price was reasonable & free shipping made the litle woman happy!!

I have been making an apricot mousse recipe for years and it has become "the" item that I am expected to bring to all family/friend gatherings. The recipe requires using apricot Jello and this item is no longer available in grocery stores. Being able to purchase  24 boxes of apricot Jello has guaranteed that my family/friends will not have to go "without" for a few more years!

Summary: Apricot jello used for making Apricot Zucchini Jam
Text: I make Aricot Zucchini jam with fresh zucchini several times a year. It is very popular with the neighbors and family members. Apricot Jello is very hard to come by in the stores so I'm glad I can find it on amazon.Great product.
Tasty and a bit out of the ordinary.  It's nice to be able to get it here.

Summary: Works wonders in a cake mix!!
Text: I use this product to make an apricot bunt cake w/lemon drizzle.......my Mom concocted years ago.  My family loves it......use the apricot jello a lot and thrilled I was able to order it thru Amazon.......very hard to find!

Summary: Dog loves the food, but the cans were badly dented
Text: My dog is a finicky eater when it comes to canned food.  After trying MANY varieties from both the pet store and the grocery store, the Alpo Chicken in Gravy is all he will eat (I can sometimes feed him the T-Bone steak flavor).  I guess it looks and tastes more like "people food" than the other varieties.  My only complaint is that when I received the shipment (pack of 24), almost all of the cans were dented, and a couple had dried gravy on the outside of the can.  One can leaked out - the dent was at the seal on the top.  Normally, I'm not someone who is picky about dented cans, but this was a little much.  A couple of the cans actually had a funny smell when I opened them.  So, I guess I'll go back to buying at the grocery store.  Just thought having them shipped to the house would be easier than lugging them home from the store.  Oh well.....

Summary: Glad Rocky Road is still available
Text: Rocky Road had been one of my parent's favorite candy bars. A conversation about Rocky Road no longer in stores got me searching on-line to see if candy was still being made. I found it here and purchased a box to give on Father's Day. Turned out to be a great gift and now I'm hooked on these too (especially broken up over ice cream!) Product was fresh and delivered quickly.

The seller says they ship 'WORLDWIDE". Yeah they stuffed the box in a letter size envelope sent USPS. Lets just say they did not all arrive in good condition. But I gave them a few stars because I ate one and it did taste nice and fresh. Trust me I can tell. They were fresh, just a little melted and squished.
I received an extremely fresh product, the marshallow inside is so soft you can easily tell the freshnes of it. This chocolate bar along with kit kat are my ultimate american favorites...

Slightly upset that the candy box was open but not the candies weren't. Just the candy box. This is a gift to my father and it is his favorite candy in the world. I do hope that he loves this candy that I'm sending him, cause he has to travel for over 1 1/2 hour drive to buy Rocky Roads. See how he loves them. Well Happy Holidays.

Product came in a timely manner. However, the product itself was less than fresh. When Rocky Road candy is at it's freshest it will literally melt in your mouth. These were a little chewier.  Kind of disappointing

Summary: This will spoil you for any other honey
Text: I first learned of Attiki honey when I went on a quest to discover what type of honey Fage Greek yogurt includes in their individual yogurt containers. I was on this quest because I had never tasted another honey as good as that which was with the Fage yogurt, but I wanted to be able to buy plain Fage and add my own honey. When I tried adding the usual honey, it just didn't taste the same. So, I found out that this Attiki is the kind Fage uses, and I ordered it. It is truly heavenly.  It's expensive, but if you use it just for special treats, it's well worth it.
I like some of the other flavors of Extra Fruit Sensations gum, but this watermelon flavor gum just tastes flat. Flavor only lasts a couple of minutes; much less than the other flavors.

Only issues is that some packages seem to get old? Not as fresh as store bought; although sometimes store bought can have the same feeling.  Hit and miss.  Don't get me wrong most are good but a few pack seem to have gotten old.

ProfileName: ChibiNeko "Sooo many books, so little time!"
Summary: Softer than other Extra flavors, but tastes a little funny
Text:
I'd previously reviewed another Extra flavor that was so rubbery to chew, it was like trying to masticate a tire. Luckily this one is plenty soft & remains soft, so perhaps it is just that flavor that is such a hard chew.

The flavor of this gum (sweet watermelon) isn't a bad flavor & lasts a long time, but there's just something about the flavor that tastes a little strange. It's got this definite chemical-ish aftertaste to it & a bit of a mint-esque taste. It isn't a nasty flavor, but it is something that I've noticed each time I've chewed a piece.

I don't know that I prefer this over my normal chewing gum (Orbit Bubblemint), but it is something that I will probably buy again at some point in the future & is definitely better than some of the other sugar-laden watermelon gum out there.

I like the watermelon flavor of this gum, and they're not lying when they say the flavor lasts longer. The extra fruit sensations gum is the longest lasting gum I've found. The only negative I have for this gum is one piece really isn't enough for me, I chew two at once.
Big improvement over old product.  Great flavor and lasts a while.  My wife goes through a pack every couple of days.

The gum taste pretty good while it lasts, appears to be endorsed by the American Dentist Association?  and they are sugar free!  Too fast on the trigger (one click shopping can be too easy sometimes) certainly not the best of the bunch. The gum looses flavor fast and what can a person do? 3 Stars for Extra Fruit Sensations. Sweet Watermelon Slim Pack, 1.76-Ounce Units (Pack of 20)!

I will say the cheese straws are the best I have ever tasted. The negative? Customer service is non existent. An internet order  was lost, even though I received a confirmation via email. I was offered no discount or upgraded shipping, no additional product with my order, no discount on my next order, not even an apology for the 7 day delay. Just an excuse that the email order was lost and that her IT guy would be on the problem tomorrow. This is not the first problem I have had with an order. They do not give a tracking number. When asked for one the odds of getting one are 50-50. I have had so many problems with my orders I will go without my Aunt Lizzies cheese straws. I will miss them greatly however I need the hassle associated with ordering them less than I need the cheese straws. Ann, I wish you the best in the future and suggest you participate in customer service training classes to refrain from losing additional customers in the future. FOLLOW UP: I just received an email notifying me that my order shipped on the Aug 9th. I have not placed an order! What more can they do?

My cat loves this food.  Admittedly I've never given him anything else for dinner but he's finicky about treats.  He will eat as much of this stuff as I've put in front of him (he's only 6 lbs. so never fed him more than 1 can at a time).  I feel good about feeding Grain Free.  But your local cat store might be able to give you a better price than Amazon can.

I love Go series and know it is good products.
My cat used to eat dry food, but she denied to eat can.
I trusted the brand and ordered 24.. so I just waste my money.
I'll never buy this can again.
I gave it to my friend's cats but they didn't like it either.
I wonder any cats like this cat??....
Honestly, couldn't trust reviews on this web....
Ordered two cases of this cat food; the first every other can was dented (some pretty BAD) and thought perhaps a fluke BUT second order was the same.

Summary: YUM my liquor store has it & I asked my 7 11 to carry it
Text:
It was WONDERFUL!boy did it go fast!

I went to my 7-11 and gave them one of these lifesavers--so they could decide if they wanted to carry it or not.
they had the peppermint and 5 flavor--we really don't care for the lime green and lemon yellow flavors
and the "mints" are too peppery...
But Butterrum is perfect!
Turns out, my local liquor store had it.
I bought what they had left and asked them to order more.

If i want to break my diet, it is better with butterrum--instead of burgers and tacos
If you have a bad taste in your mouth from medicine --butterrum
if you just want a "lift" --Butter Rum!

It will be easier to just buy a few rolls locally when we run low
and thank you for having it available thru Amazon.

We will wait if we have to--but we prefer not to :)

Moving overseas and wanted to take some of these with me.  I can only find these in Michaels Craft Stores so I was happy to find them on Amazon and at a great price.  I bought both the individual rolls and the bags with each piece wrapped, which is great for candy bowls.

We liked the product, my kids thought they were wonderful, but I was bummed to see that the sell by date on the cookies was less than 30 days from the date that I received them.  How can we eat 12 bags of cookies in that amount of time?  We won't and they will get stale.  I thought that was lousy.

I was looking for a night time snack for myself that would satisfy my sugar cravings but not have a ton of calories. Well this certainly fit the bill.

These are so good and the small bags are just the right size. Yes I could eat a whole box of these in one sitting but that kind of defeats the purpose. But because these are low in calorie I don't feel guilty if I eat two packs.

I didn't even look at expiration dates since I don't care and they're not going to last the month.

I do wish they had this in all chocolate but the cinnamon is really good also.

I'm really glad I got in on the subscribe and save before they closed it but the price went up. I saw K-mart has these for $5.99/box which is better but it's worth it to have them delivered. I don't know why the price hike.

All I can say is Yum Yum!

Very vast delivery of Teddy Grahams Snacks. If you haven't tried them I suggest that you try them and you will be hooked on them as I am.
I take a bag to work to share with coworkers. Just GREAT.

These cookies are great for kids snacks and for adults. But be careful, cus a little can get out of hand! I ate half of box while snacking and watching tv one night. Plus on auto ship, they are a great bargain.

Teddy Grahams are soooo delish, they are what a chocolate graham should be. The ones I received were expired, but Amazon worked with me to find a resolution. This issue would not prevent me from ordering them again; Amazon is one of the friendliest, most customer oriented and easiest online or brick and mortar retailers period.

Summary: Love the variety snack pack, but price is too high
Text: My kids LOVE these things. They are so convenient too.  I really like to order from Amazon, because it is so convenient... but watch the price on these little babies. I originally bought these in Sept 2011 for under seven dollars. 2 months later the price is over 14. Really?! I can appreciate inflation, but this kind of price increase is robbery!

I get these on the subscribe and save program. My kids and I love these crackers.  They are great to have on hand and you can't beat the price. I am paying $7.62 for 2 12 count boxes right now.  I can't even get that price at the store when they are on sale.  Great deal!
Great way to top off a meal with controlled amount and not a lot of sugar. One can never get to old for this kind of treat.
They are definitely Teddy Grahms.  In much better shape than what I could buy at the store.  Not many broken crackers.
I got them all none broken! I wish that the boxes were alittle bit bigger other than that everything was wonderful. I hope my Marine in Okinawa loves them!!!

Chocolate Teddy Grahams are so yummy! As an adult, I love them. I'd imagine kids would too.

PROS:
- No high fructose corn syrup.
- Crunchy little bite-sized cookies.
- Nice chocolate taste that's not fake.
- Great to eat in the car, at your desk, or wherever. It's a portable snack.
- Sweet but not sickeningly so.

CONS:
- I really have no cons other than they will get stale if you don't wrap the bag up tightly.

OVERALL OPINION:
I enjoy Chocolate Teddy Grahams as either dessert, or a snack with a cup of coffee. It's a sweet pick-me up that doesn't leave me feeling too guilty. Cures the need for chocolate, and has a nice crunch that sometimes I really want. Oh yeah, and they're cute little bears!
This is a great snack for my 2.5 year old son.  Easy to carry with us and he loves them.  Got them for a great price which makes them even better!
I love these packs. They are delicious and easy to throw in a diaper bag or my kids lunch in the morning. I can feel better sending them with this instead of cookies and junk.

We definitely enjoy Teddy Grahams in our house and for the most part these were good. The only issue I had was that the taste of the chocolate ones were a bit off, maybe a bit stale tasting. Otherwise these are a great, easy and convenient product.
My kids love these snacks and I loved the variety! When buying in bulk, it's nice when there are different flavors in the same package ... no boredom here!
I like the single-serve bags. I like the variety. And I like that they were on sale. Kudos, Teddy Grahams! You keep the Teddy Roosevelt legacy alive and tasty!

I purchased these on a whim (as with most of my Amazon buys!) thinking they would be nice for snack time in my busy household.  The kids and I both are crazy about them!  They're the perfect size for a 4 or 5 year old's snack.  They're also easy enough to open that my 4 and 5 year olds can open the package themselves.  Our favorite variety is of course chocolate.  Love having these around for trips to the zoo, on the way to the store, or to throw in the lunchbox.  Will be buying these again!

I would expect these to have become stale by the time I got to the last bag of this large quantity even though I put them in large Tupperware containers upon receipt but they were all a bit stale from the first bag I opened.  Richardson's is a good brand and I know they come better than this batch so maybe my shipment lingered in the warehouse too long before my order came in.

Summary: Chocolate river rocks a must try
Text: The first time I saw these wonderful little morsels was in a outfitters shop in the North Corolina Mountains. First glance, they looked like something to put in the bottom of a fish tank, not something to munch on, but I quickly changed my tune. they have a great crunchy shell and quality chocolate taste that I would compare to any major brand. Eat them one at a time or by by the handful, I'm sure you will enjoy them. Try them on Ice cream too, as Tony would say The're Grrrreat!

I used these rocks to make a stone fireplace on a cake and they worked great.
Quick delivery and they were very fresh and shipped well.
I ordered these for part of the decoration on my beach themed wedding cake and they were great they really looked like rocks and the taste was amazing. I will buy this product again.
They were quiet a bit smaller than I thought and I also  was hoping for bigger more smoother river rock looking as the advertisment 'implied'.

I've been eating these things for more than 40 years now and this is definitely one candy that has remained the same over all of those years. Plus, the blue is great for that ever-funny "blue lip" syndrome too! Just a great candy, and they work great in hot chocolate too for that extra special treat.  Highly recommend!
These were great for the easter activity I threw down with friends and family, everyone loved them and they were fresh and soft, Thank you

I like some flavored coffees and teas but must watch my caffiene intake. I have to infuse myself (inserting needles in 4 sites) once a week. I first was introduced to the Cafe Escapes Chai Latte at my hair stylist's. I have a Keurig and never realized this was a tea and that Keurig also carried them until I was on its website. I find they are often out of stock. I found these a bit cheaper here at Amazon and stocked up. Now when I get my hair done once/month and on the morning before I infuse, this is my little indulgence. The flavors and aroma are so calming and relaxing. I even insisted that my sister-in-law who gifted us with a Keurig coffee maker two years ago, try this. I know she likes certain teas and her coffee black. She could not believe it was tea. I sent her home with a box. The only reason I don't drink it more often is due to the empty calories/sugar. I probably should take a star off for that. I am one who does not like a really strong tea or bold coffee so this really pleases my palate. The Cafe Escapes Chai Latte is hands down my favorite.

I use the Keuring in my office.  The best source for K-cups is Amazon.  Awesome selection and great service.  The chai latte cups are one of the most requested and fly out of the box!  I can never buy just one box.
For those who like hot tea freshly prepared, by the cup, this is an excellent product at an excellent price.

Summary: Chai Latte is my private escape from Cafe Escapes!
Text: A perfect way to start the day,  as a mid-afternoon pickup or to relax after a hectic day at the office.  Cafe Escapes Chai Latte K-Cups are perfect every time.

I love the Chai Latte for an alternative to coffee. But this flavor is either in high demand or it's being discontinued? Hard to order (usually out-of-stock) or can't find at stores. Tastes like what you get at the coffee shops!!! YUM. That's why I ordered the 96 cups. Should last awhile. I hope they keep making this K-cup flavor.

I am not a big coffee fan but I wanted a Keurig maker. I absolutely love Chai Latte. I make two cups of it. I found that mixing it on the middle setting and one on the smallest cup setting mixed together makes it a perfect combination! It tastes just like when I used to buy it for 3x the price. It is creamy and the right amount of flavor. I would recommend this to anyone who is looking for a nice kick of flavor in the morning but ins't looking for the caffeine of coffee! I also enjoy this as a little treat since I am watching my weight and this doesn't make a big dent into the amount of calories I consume a day. I did wish I could find i for less expensive on Amazon as my local store has it for a better price but it is not always in stock.
Love this flavor, difficult to get as it has been out of stock for almost a year - so I stocked up - happy I have finally received these.

I recently bought a Keurig coffee maker, but have always been a fan of chai tea. I am used to drinking Panera Bread's version, which is very good. However, chai tea is a spiced milk-based tea to me and most Americans. My Keurig adds water to its drinks so I was ready to be disappointed with this chai tea.

As it brews and after taking a smell from the cup, you are hit with warm spices pretty hard. Cinnamon and ginger are ones that I made out but I knew right away it was going to be good.

Taking a sip, it is obvious that this isn't a normal K-cup. Further analysis of the nutritional facts reveals that Cafe Escapes uses a creamer based formula and the result is a silky smooth chai tea latte. This is easily my favorite flavor for my Keurig coffee maker. I drink this one later in the day and it just makes you feel great. One of the best chai teas I have ever tried and WAY better than trying to brew it yourself and WAY cheaper than buying it from a cafe.

If you don't know about Cafe Escapes and are maybe unsure of their quality, give this a shot, you will thank me (and them). They are known to use a milk-based formula in their K-cups and only make 4 flavors (Chai Tea, 2 different Hot chocolates, and a cafe mocha). I have personally tried all of their flavors and all are very good. However, the chai tea is the only one that I was absolutely blown away by.
