It is currently September and although I have written Amazon for resolution and they responded nicely, the order of pop rocks has yet to arrive. The rocks were needed for a fun way to introduce science lab books to a group of fifth graders. Do be careful from whom you order.

Pop Rocks are the best candies I've tried. Don't get me wrong, I'm italian, spanish, and german and I love these candy. When negative reviews come, don't listen to them. Try using these candies on soda. Don't hesistate; Just Buy it! I'm also a heavy metal person. Gift these to heavy metal people.
I call them diet candy because each packet is less than 40 calories.  My kids love them too.
I tried this coffee in a Keurig and absolutely loved it.  I don't personally own a Keurig so I looked for it for my regular coffee maker.  I would definitely order it again.

Summary: this is my favorite caribou coffee flavor
Text: Product was fresh and I would order from amazon again. It's cheaper than the retail stores. It's a nice medium blend, not too light but not too dark either.

Summary: I am addicted to this coffee! NOT bitter or too strong with great flavor!
Text:
I am very picky with coffee. I really dislike the super strong blends that leave a nasty aftertaste, are bitter, and require lots of cream to stomach. According to a recent Starbucks survey 40% of Americans actually don't like the super strong bold type coffee - well count me as part of that 40%. I like a mild to medium blend with a nice flavor without any bitterness.

I've tried MANY of the mild or medium roast blends. Until I found Caribou Coffee I thought there was nothing out there for me - and I did all sorts of things just to have a cup of joe to enjoy (mixing hot water in, adding flavored creamers, and so on). I alternate this coffee with the Caribou Coffee Blend Ground, 12-Ounce Bags (Pack of 2). Both are outstanding. I've bought bag after bag of this and it's always the same great coffee. Not the cheapest coffee - but for me absolutely worth the price. No need for any flavored creamers - this one has fantastic flavor on its own!

Summary: Broke the first time I used it
Text: I bought this hoping to use it for lemons and limes. Last night I needed to juice a lemon, so tried it out. It broke. Am going back to my tried-and-true glass juicer.

I tried this on a whim at a organic food store- it was so unbelievably good!  It was a total surprise and I ate it straight from the package.  The only problem I see with this product is portion control!  It is that good!
This product is to die for. It heals the skin from the inside out. My only concern in recommending it so highly is that everyone will buy it, and I will have a difficult time getting it.
Franks xtra red hot is delicious and hot.  I'm not really sure how else I can describe it for a review.  If you like hot, delicious stuff then do it.
I can never find this in stores, and it is so nice to find it in the 12oz size! Previously could only get it in the 7oz size. I use it like ketchup!!

I love mustard & have tried so many different types/brands and this is without a doubt my favorite mustard.  However, it is very spicy, so be fore-warned if you don't like spicy foods.  The taste of this mustard is so delicious that I put it on chicken & seafood before grilling or broiling.  I love this mustard so much that I am always on the lookout for recipes that will allow me to incorporate it. If you like very spicy and delicious mustard, then this is the mustard for you.

I have bought this in the whole bean form in the past but the price was fantastic I thought I would try the ground version. I is very good and tasts just as fresh as the beans. I will most likely buy the beans as I like the ritual of grinding and brewing. Since ordering Cafe Excellence coffees I have noticed that the price has jumped a little to high for me so will keep and eye out for when the price is more reasonable as when I ordered it at first.

Summary: Mild flavor, but a little acidic.
Text: This coffee is on the mild side but a little too acidic for my tastes.  I will not order again.
Good for what it is - but it will never match fresh product.  On the other hand, fresh product is not shelf-stable.

I am really enjoying these preserves.  My southern mother-in-law used to make her own pear preserves and they were to die for.  The Blue Ridge ones are the closest to hers I've been able to find anywhere on the market.  Thank you very much for making such an excellent product.

Thats exactly what you want, and no darker. Thats one of the things that makes this
company so special, they do it right.

I'm fortunate enough to have a specialty store here in St. Augustine that carries a
whole variety of Blue Ridge Jams. I had the Habanero Peach and Habanero Pineapple and
was hooked. They are both great on just a cracker with cream cheese, but I did make a
milkshake with the pineapple and it was about the best thing I've ever had.

But these Pears, WOW! Reminds me of the preserves my grandmother and mom made. They
are packed with fruit, are just sweet enough, and have that wonderful velvety consistency
all good preserves should have. I reserve these strictly for buttered biscuits, croissants,
and toast, but I'm sure there are a dozen other uses.

Its a small company that prides itself in quality and creativity. Go to blueridgejams(dot)
com for more info and high res photos of the entire product line.

This is very good honey, full of probiotics, and the taste is fantastic... only wish it was
a bit more affordable and glass jars would be nice.
these are lower in fat and calories than chips and seem to satisfy better than regular chips.  Try them, you'll like em

Summary: Every Flavor Brings Something Different to The Table
Text: I love Bagel Spice. Ever since I first heard about it from Hungry Girl, I was hooked. so happy they keep developing new flavors. I recently purchased the newest with Sea Salt, it's fantastic. A perfect addition to an egg scramble, salad, mashed potatoes, and so on. I often use the spicy mix when preparing seafood.
Great for making Cuban Bagels. Make a cream cheese sandwich with fresh Cuban bread. Smush down and place under broiler, melt a little butter on top and sprinkle with Bagel spice. Yum!

Summary: No added salt is a big plus
Text:
Yep, this is A LOT of curry powder, but if you use it often in cooking, it really is a better price than paying several dollars for a tiny bottle (even McCormick's own tiny bottle) that'll be gone in no time - or worse, make you feel like you have to ration it. I like curry powder and for once in my life, I wanted to use it and not feel I must skimp. I paid just under $11 and in about a month, I've used maybe 3/4 of an ounce (I saved an empty 1 oz bottle to keep a more manageable portion on the spice rack). Like another reviewer said, it IS possible it tastes a bit different from the 1 oz version, but I couldn't say for certain, and moreover, I don't think it's bad - I'm using it, mainly on rice dishes. To me, it's legions better than Taste Specialty Foods Hot Curry Powder, 16-Ounce but not as good as Rajah Mild Madras Curry Powder 100g.

Google "curry powder health benefits" and you'll find plenty of results; it's best known for its benefits to digestion and for anti-inflammatory qualities, but also said to boost memory and protect against Alzheimer disease and cancer.

Ingredients: Coriander, Fenugreek, Turmeric, Cumin, Black Pepper, Bay Leaves, Celery seed, Nutmeg, Cloves, Onion, Red Pepper, Ginger.

The expiration, I'm pleased to note since there is so darn much of this(!), is April 2014.

I have tried at least a dozen different curry powders in the last several weeks and found that the McCormick 1 oz bottle is the very best by far.  Based on that, I purchased the 16-ounce bottle I saw on Amazon.  I was surprised when I found that the taste of the 16-ounce product was very different, to the point of not being able to use it.

Not only is the price great, but the product tastes awesome on chicken!!  Not to mention the health benefits.  I hope it stays around long enough for me to order when I'm out, which will be awhile thanks to the size.

I haven't bought this order, but I received a tin of these mints as a present and they are the greatest. these tiny mints have an incredibly full and sweet berry flavor that gets me through the day at work! Would be so cute for a party!

It is seriously a bad taste.  No matter what we do, it tastes bad.  Bought the Orange and it is the most horrible taste.  Even when we put 1/2 a bottle in a gallon of orange juice, it takes bad, let alone when we put the whole bottle into the gallon mix of crystal light.  Do not waste your money.

I have been drinking Whey Up since 2007 and I LOVE IT! There is not another protein energy drink on the market that tastes as good or works as well. I drink at least one Whey UP a day and can certainly feel my energy levels increase when i drink it before a work out. It's also been a great source of meal replacement with 20g of protein and again, it tastes GREAT!

I even pack bottles of WHEYUP when I travel and have gone to great measures to get more WHEY UP if i run out. People who work out should drink WHEYUP for the protein energy boost they get before going to the gym. I have also pointed out to people that are dieting that they should drink WHEYUP as a meal replacement (once a day) and then keep filling the bottle with water for the rest of the day.

I love that AMAZON is now selling WHEY UP and everyone should try it!

I found this at QT and love it! I like the berry one the best. It's a great way to get the protein I need, plus the caffeine I want. The berry has a great flavor, so much better than other powdered or chocolate/vanilla flavored 'shakes'. Love it!

Summary: Best Protein Drink On The Market!
Text:
I discovered WheyUp 4 years ago after having bariatric surgery. It's a challenge to consume 60 grams of protein when your stomach is the size of a golf ball. Protein drinks are one of the best ways. The problem is, I hated the taste of every one... until WheyUp! I love the taste and I also love the caffeine. Having reached my goal weight, the challenge to ingest enough protein is still there! I like to have 1/2 before my morning workout and the other 1/2 immediately after.
I almost didn't write this review because I'm selfish and I wanted to make sure it's always in stock!

I grabbed one of these at QT a few days ago, and have loved them ever since. As I'm writing this, they're unavailable on amazon, but I'm diligently checking as I'll be ordering a lot when they start selling them.

I use this as a light, high protein pre workout drink, and I love that it has caffeine as that really helps me push myself in my early morning workouts. I've tried milk+whey, but it was too heavy for me and always seemed to sit on my stomach and make me feel sluggish as I was trying to lift. I've also tried water+whey, but mannnn that tastes horrendous and I just have a hard time doing it. And neither of those have caffeine, which I think really helps to energize me. So far I've tried the grape and berry, and liked both. I haven't tried any of the other flavors.

This does taste a little tiny bit bitter at times, and definitely isn't as good tasting as a protein shake, but it's perfect otherwise. And you're not really drinking it for the taste anyways, are you? Grab one of these, lift a lot of heavy weight up and down as many times as you can, follow up with a post-workout shake, rest and repeat, and you'll get strong. Highly recommended!

... I wished they didn't raise its price recently..
Now, it's cheaper to buy it at the store (around $7.69).
this is the best tea. brew it in a porcelain teapot and use a small glass for drinking. enjoy it...

Pretty good stuff for the money.  Very fragrant, nice aroma.  Only complaint is includes artificial as well as natural bergamot flavoring.  Eh, my palate is not discerning enough to note the difference, but I have to wonder ... why not all natural?

My old favorite was Jasmine tea but ever since someone gave me one of these teabags to try this has been my new favorite. I love the taste and aroma, although if you don't keep it in an airtight container it loses its potency. Regardless, I need to order the 100 teabag size everytime because I go through it quite often. This last time I ordered from Sadaf directly, they sent me a keychain and a tiny box of Special Blend with Cardamom (5 teabags). I really appreciated that. It's little things like that which will keep me coming back - even if I don't enjoy the Cardamom Tea sample! I didn't realize Amazon sold this brand and I hope they get some of this in soon.

FYI - I noticed on the Sadaf website that they now have a Special Blend Jasmine tea as well. I'm definitely going to try that next time I order some of my Special Blend with Earl Grey!

Also, as a side note, I drink this sometimes with a little lemon juice and sometimes with a tiny amount of orange juice added. Either way it's delicious and unique... as it is just plain.
Love this hot chocolate and it can be hard to find.  The spices in the cocoa blend really create a warm, enjoyable hot drink any time of the year.

I have a lot of allergies, so I am often making things from scratch for myself. One of the things I have to make is chocolate, and these little cocoa butter bits are perfect for blending in with baker's chocolate to get a smooth, shiny base. I'm also working on a white chocolate recipe and cinnamon roll frosting with them. Very good for the money.

Love it! My favorite usage of this wonderful product is to add it to my morning porridge. For example, try semolina/yellow corn grits/cocoa butter chips or semolina/barley/cocoa butter chips. Of course you add the chips when the porridge is ready, you don't cook them. Enjoy!

I love chai and raspberries, put together they are heavenly.  Big Train makes many drinks that I like, and this is no exception, in fact this may be my favorite.  There is convenience in the single serving, and the price through Amazon is much better than I could get locally.
Very tasty and smells great! Very convenient packaging. I love this. I just wish they had a version of it that was organic.
Easy to prepare and almost healthy, a nice alternative to thos pricey pre-mixed bottled beverages.

Summary: Good dog chews for small dogs
Text: These are good quality chew sticks but way too small for our Dobie puppy.  He would soften them up and then swallow them whole.  I would only recommend for very small dogs.  But they are clean and don't dirty the carpet.  I still think they smell bad even though they are "low odor", but they are a quality chew and my dog loves them.

Wow this one whisks up really nicely! Granted I am getting better at whisking and making a nice froth on top of my matcha but this one was easy peasy! I have noticed some matcha flavors mix more easily than others for some reason and since I do make more than one matcha many days its not just due to me being better one day versus another. This one whisked up to a very full forth quite easily! I note this because I know froth is really something many of us struggle with especially when we are new to matcha so I wanted to make a note of it for those of you who may feel deflated by not getting a good foam. Get this one and you can feel stellar! lol

Now as for taste, I am not one who has had a lot of passion fruit in their life, other than in smoothies I have got from smoothie places and those are usually so riddled with sugars and other fruits picking out the passion fruit itself was a little difficult especially not having passion fruit in and of itself.

Now I get to taste real passion fruit! Yay!

It has a bit of this natural rind like flavor similar to that you sometimes get in a mango or papaya. Fruits I do have personal experience with. I like it though - it really compliments the natural grassy like flavor of the matcha base! And contrary to the smoothies I have had its not that sweet. There is a tart flavor to it but not bitter. It tastes REALLY healthy, and while matcha is always healthy sometimes I feel guilty having my dessert like matcha lol although I shouldn't such as my favorite butterscotch mathca makes me feel like I'm cheating haha this one makes me feel like I am really doing something good for my body and trust me my body needs all the help it can get!

The aroma of this one is really quite nice! It is very eye opening and even if its only a mental thing I sure can use that in the mornings!

There is the after taste of the rind like flavor but the passion fruit flavor makes my mouth water for more, literally, as if the juices itself are pulling out the watery mouth sensation! Its strange but nice. Its like having a mouth full of juicy passion fruit!

So I drank half of my matcha straight, then added some sparkling italian water and some sweet cream non dairy creamer to make an italian soda and OMG goodness! The flavors ERUPT into a juicy fruit gum sensation which is similar in some ways to the brandy matcha I am going to review next! It is different though as the brandy also has alcohol notes to it whereas this one does not. This is like the virgin variable you give your kids while you have the brandy one haha. Except this has that lovely awakening rind flavor in the background that lingers in the after taste.

I've had "passionfruit" flavored teas that tasted nothing like passionfruit. Red Leaf's passionfruit matcha is not one of them. This delicious tropical fruit flavor definitely shines alongside the base matcha. I prefer this matcha cold, though I plan to try it hot come winter. It'll be perfect for summer daydreaming, because there's something about the flavor of passionfruit that screams summer. It's well captured in this matcha. The flavor isn't heavy, but I do find that just the slightest touch of milk/cream really rounds out the cup. Another hit from Red Leaf!

Summary: I wouldn't call them "cookies". Also, the label language is obscure.
Text:
These don't have an appropriate texture to be called "cookies". The ingredients aren't blended well, so it feels more like a granola bar to me, and I've always hated granola bars (even when I was unaware of their harmful effects on human health). They also smell artificially, which interferes with the perception of their taste... although I can't tell if they have any taste, besides some sweetness. Where did orange, ginger, and chocolate go?

It's also irritating that the manufacturer doesn't talk about the ingredients in a simple and straightforward manner. Why say "low glycemic monosaccharide" and "low glycemic fruit concentrate"? Admit that it is FRUCTOSE. It is not enough to say "vegetable fiber". They are supposed to know exactly WHAT KIND of fiber they use, because it makes a difference.

Summary: Really Lovely Taste. My fave low-carb cookie, and it's GLUTEN FREE and doesn't make for tummy rumbles.
Text:
These taste GREAT. These don't have gluten. These are lower carb. These have no sugar. JACKPOT!

I searched quite a while to find a treat/snack/dessert that I could enjoy on my diet and my once-sugar-addict hubby could enjoy so he doesn't feel deprived. I do carb controlled "Primarian" type dieting (mostly protein and veggies, with some cheese/yogurt, fruit and nuts/nut butters, no sugar (rarely, anyway), no gluten. I've given up most grains and have lost 110 lbs. Hubby is nearly underweight eating this way, so he gets extra snacks/treats.) So, I really had a hard time finding certain convenient (ie, I don't have to make it!) dessert items. These cookies solved my dilemma.

I like the Orange Ginger Chocolate best, followed by the Island Lime. I found the peanut butter ones had a weird oily flavor. My super picky hubby likes the Cinni-Apple Spice. We've reordered these multiple times in the last few months, usually 4 or 6 bags at a time of EACH the three flavors. It gets really expensive, but it consolidates shipping. At 2 to 3 cookies at a time as a post-dinner or post-lunch dessert, it keeps me sane. Seriously, while I love fruit for dessert, sometimes, I just want me something that TASTES like I'm having pure old-fashioned junk. :D

The texture is the only thing that could be improved on my fave two flavors. (I find the Cinni-Apple spice fine, but blander than I prefer, hence my preference for the others.) Some batches are nicely crispy. Others are chewy and stuck-together. I think they don't handle transport in the summer heat too well or the moisture levels in summer, cause my order earlier in the year were much nicer (ie, during the cooler/drier months). But even with the chewier texture and less crispness the flavor shines.

Island Lime is mis-named. They should just call it Coconut Citrus. It's mostly coconut. It tasted 90% coconut to me with a hint of the citrus. Suits me fine. I adore coconut cookies (ie, the old sugary ones I used to get). So, if you expect heavy lime, sorry. If you love coconut, go for it. I judge most items I buy by the first five ingredients. Sure, the others count, but those are the BULK of what makes a lot of items, so here goes for Island Lime: Almonds, whey protein concentrate, unsweetened coconut, egg whites, vegetable fiber. Very low-carb friendly stuff. It's 79 calories per serving of 2 cookies, 4 grams of fiber, 1 sugar, and 2 grams of protein.

My fave, the Orange Ginger Chocolate taste like a bit of chocolate met a bit of Cointreau and had a baby. It's not a heavy choco taste. It's not really all that gingery. Just a bit. And the citrus reminds me of my earlier years when I sipped Cointreau at parties. Same texture issues, but the taste is a treat to me with coffee. Really satisfies. The nutritional profile didn't please me as much as the Island Lime, but hey, you sometimes just need that treat. First Five: Almonds, Whey protein concentrate, egg whites, vegetable fiber, maltodextrin. It's 74 calories for 2 cookies (an acceptable amount on my 1200 to 1400 calorie diet), and it has 3 grams of fiber, 1 sugar, and 3 grams of protein per serving.

I don't get intestinal distress like I do with some low-carb/diet stuff with sugar substitutes, which is another bonus. And the fiber content pleases me, too.

If you miss having cookie on your diet and need to avoid gluten, here ya go. Enjoy.

I would note that Netrition has a better price on these and reasonable shipping. Wish Amazon would stock and sell these. I order these a lot and it would save me loads to get it on my Prime list of items. Oh, well. Worth trying, no matter the vendor.

Summary: Tasty, cherry vanilla flavor and good for your teeth.
Text: They have a sweet and ever so slightly tart, cherry vanilla flavor. I really like the flavor, I just wish it were a tiny bit stronger.  I leave them in a jar for my kids to enjoy, especially after snacks and meals.  Guilt-free and good for your teeth.  All in all, a great lollipop with pretty, swirly colors too.
Not very sweet. Very bland, and in my opinion too expensive for the product. Flavorless, doesn't taste like you're having a treat but the amount of carbs is high.
The taste is like a bitter cherry. I don't like them but my kids do. Good be a little sweeter!
Great for babies learning to taste and enjoy food.  I never thought he would love vegetables so much.  He loves these!

My son loves the Gerber baby foods, and this pack saves me from having to buy individual containers.  There aren't any additives and these actually taste like the real foods.  Some other baby foods just don't taste right.  These containers are also reusable, and they don't break like the jars do.

The food is great and convenient to get it in an assorted pack but 18 pack means 9 PACKS OF 2. This is not a good deal and you can get these items for less as an individual purchase from almost any store.
Great for the price.  Don't bake too long or you won't have the runny lava center.  Very quick & easy & comes with it's own little pans.

Summary: Almost as good as what you'll get in the restaurant
Text:
At 2 fat grams per cake I was very skeptical of the taste of this product, but I was quite happily surprised. I'm a total choco-phile and I'm always looking for ways to get my fix without the all-consuming waistline guilt.

It's not as decadent as what you'll get in a restaurant but then again those babies pack anywhere from 20-50 grams of fat per cake. Let's not even TALK about the calories!

I've tried both the plain chocolate and the mint chocolate version of this product and both are VERY good. I recommend it for anyone, but particularly for choco-holics who don't want to consume a whole day's fat allowance in one shot! ;)

This cake was a very rich chocolate in the middle.
It was the family's first lava cake.

So, if you love rich chocolate,
this is for you.

I am going to bake the next one
longer to please the family.

It is very quick & easy to do,
with a very good price!

I bought this only for an occasional
treat as we are attempting to eliminate
processed foods.

It just looked good, and it was!

I lost faith in my long time cat food, Science Diet, after the massive pet food recall.  Fromm claims this dry food is made in the US (Wisconsin) from meat, cheese and vegetables bought from local growers.  Quality meats, no glutens, fresh vegetables and human quality vitamins.  The cats like it.  It is more expensive than Science Diet, but not prohibitively so.  Note:  the Milwaukee newspaper advises the canned Fromm is made in China.  I have absolutely no faith in the Chinese quality and safety control standards so I would not buy the canned foods.

Although this is listed as a 5-lb (225 kg) bag, it is NOT.  It is only a 2.5 lb (1.1kg) bag.  Believe me, I very carefully checked the shipping weight in the description when I ordered it because it was a good price.  That has been changed in the few days since I placed the original order, however the main listing heading has not been changed. VERY misleading.

Summary: Great food, but totally misleading weight
Text:
I've submitted this review once before, and it appears to have been deleted. Even odder, the description of the product has been changed to make it even more misleading.

This is NOT a 5 LB bag, it is a 2.5 LB bag, which means you're paying twice as much per ounce as you should. This is a comparable price for the 5 LB bag. The seller needs to change both the description and the picture, otherwise they're going to keep cheating customers.

All of that is a shame, really, because this is a very high quality food that my cats love. I recommend this kibble highly.

Summary: Vya Sweet Vermouth elevates your mixed drink beyond expectations!
Text:
Vya Sweet Vermouth elevates your mixed drink beyond expectations! I just discovered this brand's Vermouth this past week off the internet blogs. I'd been plowing thru other Vermouth brands adjusting my Manhattans. This one is spectacular.

I'm going out tomorrow to hunt down their Dry and Whisper Dry for my Martini's, and I think this one is going to be my favorite gift to give for the forseeable future! This will be fun to introduce to my friends.

Buy stock! Via can only get more popular. As I said...spectacular.

This is such a great way to buy cereal and this is a way that I can help my mother who lives on a very fixed low income. I can buy her food and have it shipped directly to her home and then she has food and does not have to get out in the cold Colorado weather and bad roads to get to the grocery store to buy her groceries. I hope that Amazon continues to work with companies and expand their groceries so that I can do more fo her

Summary: A true cereal for the masses!
Text: What can I say? It doesn't get anymore basic than corn flakes! The way I see it, Kellogg's has corn flakes and general mills has cheerios. then there's honey nut cherrios and frosted flakes, 2 great cereals originating from 2 classic cereals!

When did the rooster on the box get a cartoony face? Whatever happened to that wonderful abstraction? First they ruined Tony the Tiger, now this.

And where did all the high fructose corn syrup come from? Admittedly, it is a flake of corn but that is a nasty ingredient to be skipped at all costs.

It's things like that which drive people to the formerly odd grains like spelt and kamut!

Summary: THE CREEPIEST AFTERNOON  OF MY LIFE...
Text:
Admittedly, I had a fever.

And I must say I am a devotee of the Corn Flake (though I only eat Trader Joe's Brand--Kellogg's flakes, though tasty, have too much crap in them).

But Cereal City--the true target of this review--and a place that now has GREAT bearing on my thoughts about this product--was CREEPY.

From the bald lady with two teeth who took our ticket and felt that this gave her liscense to engage us in a too-long conversation, to the Pennywise-looking clown that reeked of smoke--our first two minutes set the tone.

Throw in a weird new-agey film with floating balls of light that became speaking versions of dead historic figures who never got along in life and pick up their arguments right where they left off on the screen.

Add to that a poorly-lit animatronic Snap, Crackle, and Pop who end up either looking like they are rising from the grave or falling in worship at the feet of Tony the Tiger (depending on whether they are coming up or going back down).

Our (hopefully) unique experience involved not being able to find a lady crucial to our scavanger hunt for 45 minutes (did she go in back and take a nap?) I want a shirt that says "I waited 45 minutes to complete the Cereal City scavanger hunt and all I got was this crappy sippy cup."

Sadly there is much, much more...I could go on at length. But I won't.

The main point is that I get the sense that Kellogg's, as a company, is just as creepy as its tourist trap. Avoid both.

i was expecting this product to be like the picture and come in a small beer stein mug but it was plain jars of mustard. the mustard is fine but the picture is deceiving and i was buying the product for the glass beer stein as a present. not was i wanted.

Summary: FINALLY a great vanilla milk syrup!
Text: I am SUPER picky about my flavored milk, it has to taste just right and for the longest time I have been looking for a vanilla milk mix or syrup that tastes any good at all. This is is! I was surprised when I first opened it because the syrup is very clear and looks thin, but boy does it pack a flavor punch. It's great, I'm sorry I only ordered one bottle. Good stuff!

The Fox's U-Bet Vanilla Syrup is great that I ordered.  The people I ordered from mixed the order up, and shipped the wrong quantity.  Even though I e-mailed them several times, they never got back to me at all.  So I still received the wrong order.

My husband absolutely loves vanilla egg creams but living in California, these are hard to come by!  With his birthday coming up, I wanted to surprise him with a genuine (vanilla) egg cream.  However, I had no idea how to make one!  So after doing a bunch of research  on all this, I found out it was essential to use UBet's Vanilla syrup.  Well, guess what, I did as recommended, followed the making of one down to the letter, and boy oh boy... not only was my husband thrilled, I now LOVE vanilla egg creams! This syrup is also great as a flavoring in sodas.  I highly recommend anyone to give it a try!

This is a good basic vanilla syrup. I have used it as a sweetener for coffee, and added it to sparkling water to make a respectable cream soda. The price is excellent, after comparing it to Torani and DaVinci syrups.

Thank you, thank you, thank you for your wonderful vanilla syrup.  The Shop Rite stores in my area can't keep it on the shelves.  For me, it's a life saver as it helps me to get my 6 year old to drink her milk.  Sometimes, I have a glass myself. Yum!

I'm on a low budget, a lot of it consisting of canned foods like campbells chunky firehouse hot and spicy chili. Like the other reviews available mentioned, it is NOT spicy by any real standards. For anyone who's been to a curry house chain restaurant, and ordered "hot" and not extra/super hot, you'll realize the definition of hot is rapidly changing to fit the more moderate group of individuals. If I'm really trying to save money that week, I just have a can a day. Half a can with rice, for lunch, and half a can with rice for dinner. I prefer to have it with long grain rice since its generally a bit dryer and goes better with the liquidy nature of the chili. I eat it with cheetos flaming hot chips, not the healthiest diet by any means, but it is a VERY cheap meal, and tastes great with the combination of things. What I like most about the chili is its high fiber content, I'm not one for eating a lot of vegetables, so the fiber in this really helps.

I read the other two reviews and was really looking forward to this chili. It is not remotely hot at all. It is good and has great flavor but should not have the name Firehouse on it. It is a good canned chili but I've had other can chili's that had a lot more heat.

I love hot and spicy stuff and my wife can tolerate some of it. We both ate this chili and found it to not be a "hot and spicy chili" in the slightest. I did enjoy

I would have given it 4-stars because it is a good product but it does not live up to it's name. If you're wanting something hot, look at another product.
This is decent tasting for a canned chili.  However, the people who say it's hot obviously don't eat a lot of spicy food.  I'd put it in a low medium heat category for chili.

i like chili but i have not tasted too many great ones. this chili is great. it tastes like a spicy version of the chili that i eat from the restaurant "Chilis", but for a fraction of the price. If you're looking to burn the hell out of your mouth, this isn't the chili for you, i can see how some can be disapointed. this is a spicy chili but not a "too hot" spicy chili, just moderate. if you're looking for a great chili with some moderate kickback, this is a 4-5 star cheap go-to canned chili, the best ive tasted! if you're looking for a super spicy chili, that lives up to the name "firehouse", you will have to look elsewhere, this doesn't even make me want water, but at the same time, it leaves my mouth feeling nice and spicy fresh, i wont go back to "regular" now.
This used to be one of my favorite canned foods, now the meat is rubbery.  It was not like this before they reduced the can size to 15 oz.  Barely edible.

I LOVE hot chili. In my opinion chili should be HOT, otherwise all you've got is bean soup with hamburger in it. This chili is all that and more. I decided to try it without adding my usual hot stuff to everything I eat. I was pleasently suprised to find my eyes sweating and having to stop to blow my nose.

BUY THIS BY THE CASE!!!

My husband believes that this particular chili soup is better than his home made chili, which he will never make again as long as he can keep a supply of the Firehouse Hot & Spicy Chili on hand.  It is full of flavor,beef and beans and we have used it as a topping for baked potatoes. It is spicy, so if you don't like food that's spicy, don't buy this soup.  I have no idea how the other chili Campbell soups taste.  However, this is a winner.
This is a real hot and spicy chili. If you find it too hot, try the Campbell's Chunky Roadhouse Chili.

Summary: Trader Joes Dark Chocolate Orange Sticks
Text: So many TJ's items ~ so little money and they are so far away. I was thrilled to find these Chocolate Orange Sticks at Amazon.com and ordered them right away. Delicious dark chocolate with orange gel inside that has a perfect tanginess. Highly recommended!

Summary: If you like Chocolate Oranges, you'll love this
Text:
Score another hit from Trader Joe's. These chocolate orange sticks are delicious.
We buy them and put them in gift baskets for friends or colleagues, or sometimes take them to the office to open up on my husband's desk to share.
Orange and chocolate is an interesting flavor blend, and most people find it to be delicious. The price here is more than you'll pay in your local store, though.

I have tried chai's from many different latte' stands.  It was hit and miss when it came to taste.  Luckily, my barista and my local stand told me it was the mix and not necessarily the barista.  She told me they used Big Train Chai.  She was right.  I can now make my own chai's at home using Big Train Chai that are as good as what I get from the latte' stands and have cut my morning chai addiction costs considerably.

Summary: You have got to be kidding
Text:
so got the package, and through my own fault for not reading everything got hit with over $12 in shipping charges. Really, don't know about you but to me, that is way too much. So open the bag of tea... no scoop... directions read in hot water put 2 sccops in... no scoop... huh? Was just informed they don't put a scoop in every bag... what??? So while I may enjoy the tea... forget it, last time I buy from this company.

The old buyer beware is how I would rate this company.

My doctor recommended I use this formula as a supplement for my son. My son was not a premie but at 6lbs 2oz he wasn't breaking the scale either so the extra calories in this formula are perfect for him. Also for some reason he has no trouble going back and forth from breast milk to the Neosure formula, my daughter struggled quite a bit when I introduced formula in her diet, it wasn't the Neosure. Bottom line is I have been very happy, and so has my little boy.

LaCosta Gourmet's customer service is incredibly wonderful.  Tonight, I ordered only one pound of coffee that needed to be delivered in two days.  I tried to order it with upgraded shipping but, after I got Amazon's confirmation, it showed standard shipping and could take 8 days, given the intervening federal holiday and weekend.  Seeing that, I emailed La Costa Gourmet to see if the shipping could be upgraded to 2-day.  Within five minutes--I kid you not, 5 minutes!!!, Jeff at La Costa Gourmet called me, assuring that the order was due to go out first thing in the morning and is expected to arrive in two days, no need for an additional shipping fee.  I know that the order for one pound of coffee seems like a small matter but, it is for a family member heading overseas.  This small matter was very important to me and obviously very important to La Costa Gourmet.  They have earned my undying loyalty for customer service, great communication, & not ripping me off for an additional shipping fee.

This product is by far one of the best cookies this universe has ever known. Tiny TRON discs of delicate and balanced crunch and chocolate that ebbs and flows like a dream landscape, reality becomes liquid candles and you are the wick... set yourself ablaze and eat these cookies.

They really are the best cookies, I'd place them side by side with those LU Cookies Le Petit Ecolier, The Little Schoolboy which can also be bought here on Amazon.

Why settle for boring cookies when you can eat the best?
My spring diet consists of meat from Schwan's, pickles, mushrooms and these Jalapenos. The 24 cans last 3 months. I enjoy the mild sting and the many carrot slices.

Summary: Very good and excellent quality taste!
Text: If you want a true jalapeno,taste look no futher,we love these!! can use them in so many ways,we have opened a can and even put them on subs and sanwiches,i also used the in making spanish chicken and beef dishes!! will buy again!

These are sliced the long way, so they make nice strips to fold into eggs or drop into soup or whatever. They add a lot of flavor. Jalapenos aren't as hot as serranos. You can use both to get even more flavor. These are a good way to make your food a lot more interesting.

Summary: Delicious and at a great price
Text: These syrups for Sno Cones are delicious. Our family loves them, we had also purchased a pack of the Hawaiian Ice syrups and we prefer these (and they are cheaper). A very good deal. I will be buying more soon.
EXCELLENT PRODUCT, SWEET TASTY AND THE KIDS LOVE THEM....GREAT FOR PARTIES OR ANY HOT SUMMER DAY....ALL OF THE FLAVORS TASTE GREAT...
These syrups are great for slushes. My kids love them and they are great for summer parties. Very good product.

I have ordered Hawaiian Shaved Ice 10 pint pack for $44 and this time around decided to try Great Northern Polar's 10 pint pack for $29 (both have free Super Saver Shipping).  I was pleasantly surprised and happy with my Great Northern purchases upon testing.  The ten flavors all taste very delicious and I prefer the texture of the shaved ice when G N P's syrup is poured on, as opposed to Hawaiian Shaved Ice's.  I'd definitely recommend this less expensive option for snow cone syrup!!
I bought a 10 pack of quart bottles of Great Northern syrups for my Polar Ice Cub shaver and they are so good, we all love it.  Well worth it.
A very easy process with good communication and the product exactly as advertised.  I particularly appreciate the packing - very secure.
Worth every penny, a little goes a long way.  Ordered these and many snowcones later, still have plenty.  The taste is awesome, and the thicker syrup covers the ice great.
I bought a 10 pack of this snow cone syrup for my grandchildren & they just love it. The taste is great & it's nice having it already to go, no mixing. I would/will be buying from them again.

I had recently bought an Hawaiian Ice Machine from Great Northern which we love.  The kids loved the flavors and the added cones and straws are an added bonus.  A little pricey but delivered to your door and ready to go.
this product is the best in usa , We bought this for our grown-up snow cones. Absolutely yummy. Pour spouts are easy to use Flavours are delicious

Summary: Cherry flavor with a hint of sour.
Text:
These candies are very good. They have a nice cherry flavor with just a little bit of sour thrown in. Most sour candies made these days make your eyes water and your mouth pucker. Not these gummi's, they have just enough of a sour taste to make them interesting but the sour taste is very very mild.

My order came in great condition and very fresh.

Summary: Not so sour, but pretty tasty
Text:
My friends and I were quite disappointed when our bag of sour gummy cherries arrived. I love all the regular Haribo products but this is one I had never tried.

Alas, the sour powder was more of a sugar topping. Not sour at all!

Haribo makes good gummy candy, but saying these are sour is quite misleading!

Not sour as some of the other reviewers have stated. I for one could not really taste any sour bits, but it's a fine gummi candy on it's own. Sugar coated, etc. Just wish it was sour, or at least Hairbo made a 'proper' sour gummi candy.

We love Haribo.. We already went through Super Coke Bottles and Gummi Bears..

We also love sour candy.. and yes the kind that makes your lips pucker.. :-)

I was disappointed at the "sour-ness" of Sour Cherries..

but...

the family will find it in their heart to consume them.. unlike the

Pink Grapefruit which I will be giving away..
i ate this whole bag in like 3 days.  if you like the gummy bears you will like these too.  great flavor.

Summary: Too Sweet & Not Sour Enough; Like a Cherry Cough Drop!
Text:
These Haribo sour cherries are vibrantly colored and look like a red cherry on a green stem with a green leaf attached. Each piece is over an inch long. They are very cute!

Unfortunately, they are sugary sweet and not sour to me at all. They taste just like those cherry flavored cough drops that come in the red and white box and have no medicinal purposes whatsoever!

If you like the flavor of artificial cherries, these are good. They smell good too. If you are looking for candies for a kids birthday party, these will definitely be a hit! If you need a sugary pick-me-up, grab a few and you're set. But if you really want something more sour, try another kind of Haribo candy.

Added thought: these would be beautiful cake decorations!

Summary: More sweet than sour but still great.
Text: I bought them being familiar with the taste in the past. They taste great and lasted for nearly two weeks between my roommate and I, which is a long time for us.

Summary: It's okay for someone with a sweet tooth.
Text: The candy was just okay. They are large gummy candies. It's not sour like I would have liked it to be though. They are a bit tough even when sitting at room temperature.
I brought these as a reward for my students and they loved them!  Taste and appearance was A+!  Not too sour - just right!

Finest Teutonic gummy candy. If you ever tried this you know what it is and you are getting your credit card right now.
6 out of 5 stars. Yes, they are that good.

I bought several bags of these... filled them in a giant jar, and my roommates and friends went through 25 pounds in a month.  Yes, that's right, in one month.  That's testimony for how amazing and delicious Haribo can make gelatin taste....

Summary: Ya gotta love sours to love these
Text: These cherries are sour and chewy. Just writing about them makes my mouth water as if I were thinking of sucking on a lemon. You have to like sour things to enjoy these. But they are pretty nice if you do love sour flavors.

i got this bag as part of the TWO bag "special", dont like how they rope you into buying two bags to get the Free shipping. making it $28 all together! these cherries are NOT at ALL Sour! Big Bummer! Even worse was that every single one of them in this 5 pound bag were BROKEN. none of them were in one piece, the stem connected to the cherry. i used them for Valentine favors, and they were NOT cute like the raspberries, because they were in parts. the non-saur part was the Big let down. they may have come broken because they were shipped in the Dead of winter. tho they did not sit outside for one second. so not sure if they always come broken. i will NOT be getting these again.
So good I am sure this caused the 4 cavities my dentist found all over my teeth. I am a sugar fiend.

I have loved this candy since 1980 whe I bought my first bag in Germany and am so happy that I can get it in bulk from Amazon there are many gummy products out there but Haribo Gummi candy is the standard that no one else can meet.

Summary: Great tasting, cannot eat but one!
Text: These sour cherries are not too sweet and you cannot eat just one.  Great buy

What's not to love about these sour and oh-so chewy candies? Gotta love em to the very last one, though I did by a 5-pound bag for just my household(almost too much) and it was some time before they were finally gone.

Summary: Too Sweet, Not Sour at all
Text:
These are way too sweet. I'm a huge fan of Haribo Gold Bears, but this was a real let down. Large chrystals of sugar overwhelm, with no trace of sour.

yuck

I ordered these because I was once an exchange student in Sweden and one of my favorite gummi candies over there were these sour cherries.  They were two cherries on a stem and sour!  I got there and they were tasty (and being Haribo--Swedish) but not very sour.  I sucked on the candies for awhile and once the sugary coating was off the gummy inside was more sour, but still the wrong candies.  I guess I'll have to wait until I get back to my beloved Sweden.  :-(

Summary: 2 Much sugar, No Sour twang at all!!
Text:
I was very dissapointed with these so called "Sour Cherry Gummies", as an avid haribo Gummy Fan, I was expecting at least some type of sour taste, instead just overly sweet and sugar coated, not even much Cherry flavor just very very sweet and overwhelming sugar flavor.
If u want some gummies that r sour and tangy, try Fizzy Cola bottles!!
They still have sugar coating but a very good, not 2 sweet tangy and tart flavor!! Enjoy....

Haribo Sour Cherries were disappointing.

I expected them to be "Sour- Tasting" &

they were not. I would not buy them again.

Summary: Beware: NOT the sour cherries from tangfastic!!!!
Text: If you've ever had the Haribo Tangfastics and are looking for the Sour Cherries from it, these are NOT them! I have had the tangfastics, and the sour cherries in UK, and these are a different cherry! They taste more watermelony to me, and are not sour at all! If you have no expectations then they are pretty good though.

Bought this candy to try it as a fill in snack. Much too sugary.  The cherry flavor is ok. The bag is HUGE. So it's good if you have a lot of kids to eat them. They advertise a five pound bag, it certainly is a five pound bag. Too sweet for me, but ok.

Summary: Very good, but not gummy bears.. actually music notes!
Text: Germans make the best candy.. well from what I can tell with these, YES!  My co-workers ate them all up in about 5 days.... That should tell you the quality.. or not because co-workers will eat anything!  No but seriously they are good.. not very sour.. like I said though. Totally awesome!

Summary: Nice treat but one whole sour cherry is too much...
Text:
I LOVE sour candy, so I thought I'd try these.

The Haribo Sour Cherries are really good, and can last quite a while in your

mouth if you can refrain from chewing them up!

However, I find that you have to chew off either the leaf or the cherry

to have an amount to eat that is the right size. Eating a whole

sour cherry is too much at once!

YUM!

Summary: WHOLE WHEAT NOODLES: Not Gluten Free
Text: Take note: these are WHOLE WHEAT mixed with quinoa, NOT GLUTEN FREE quinoa. Wasn't made obvious that these were wheat on the sale page. I didn't even know Ancient Harvest made a wheat/quinoa blend. Argh! $25 down the toilet. Learn from my error!
Well, the Amazon page might show you a nice box regarding celiac awareness month, and lots of gluten-free products, but, Alas, as I found and some have found, this is not a gluten-free product.
Agree with all of the other reviewers! I buy the regular quinoa pasta all the time and want even aware that they sold a quinoa/wheat mix. Stuck with a product I cannot eat.

Summary: Maybe a reading class would help.
Text:
Every complaint says that this product is misrepresented. However, the box clearly states Organic Whole Wheat - Quinoa Blend.
Also, the description on the page states: "
Ingredients
Organic Whole Wheat Durum Flour, Organic Quinoa Flour."

I think the reviewers are misrepresenting their search skills and reading ability. If all else fails, always check the website of Ancient Harvest, or at least find a health foods store and look at the box.
This product closely resembles the gluten free variety and does not do enough to demonstrate the difference. My wife has celiac disease, we bought this inadvertently and cannot return it.

I wanted to order gluten free spaghetti as I had before. This product, with nearly identical packaging, came up in the search results and I failed to notice it was wheat pasta. I discovered this only after opening the box.

I donated the 11 unopened boxes to the local food pantry.

Summary: This bread is good toasted with a topping!
Text: I've eaten it with seafood (shrimp, tuna, or salmon) salad, avocado and cream cheese, and preserves and cream cheese. I also like it with mustard.

My brother from NYC introduced these to me last year. I've purchased and eaten all flavors - they are amazingly crunchy and flavorful!
This is a small, family run company - there are just a few hands producing the graphics, cooking the nuts, and packaging them up for our consumption.
Their website has some gift options that come in beautifully crafted and unique packaging that are perfect for foodie friends and clients. We sent them as corporate holiday gifts to some of our clients this year.
[...]

I tried all of the flavors.  Every single one of them is delicious.  The cashews are of high quality, fresh & the flavors are so deliciously different than other cashews I had before.  Even the simple Lightly Salted is not the same as other lightly salted cashews in the market.  Highly recommended!  I even bought the ones with gift packaging for my friends & they all love it!

Summary: These are the ones you want.
Text:
Once, years ago whilst working in a faraway land I sat down to eat with a co-worker who had upon his plate a heaping helping of fish bodies swimming in a tomato sauce. "What, pray tell, are those" I queried? "Sardines," he said, to which I replied "No." We settled the dispute by fishing out the can from the garbage and ascertaining that it did indeed state 'Sardines' on the label. I was flabbergasted, having had no idea that a sardine can be as large as a plate as th0se were, or as small as a pinkie finger as many of these King Oscar Tiny Tots are....but let's face it: Nobody wants to eat a humongous sardine. In fact, doing so is antithetical to the meaning of the small fish, it's oxymoronic, and downright distasteful to do so, possibly even disrespectful.

In the years since then whenever I got the craving for sardines I would buy a can of them, usually in mustard sauce, then catch myself thinking that I remembered sardines being tiny fish packed, well, like sardines in a can, and the ones I was buying seemed relatively large....generally as large as the can was wide and meaty such that they would quite overwhelm the saltine cracker I placed them on, and they tasted like fish. I'm not complaining, I'm from a state that was famous for its sardines and the ones I was eating were often caught and processed there....I just thought that Sardines were, by their nature, tiny.

It turns out that the name Sardine is a term similar to Beer. In other words, lots of different kinds of fish get to be called Sardines but to me and likely to most people, classic sardines are meant to be small and Brisling: The kind of fish that can be stacked two high in a can as small as a sardine can. There is another fish called the Sild harvested in Scotland that is just as or nearly as small which I suppose makes it too a classic sardine, but most of the others that we eat over here in the US are slightly larger with more dark flesh and a fishier taste. Them are good, but these are better!!!

In fact, these are great. They are great because they are tiny (most are 3" in length), of delicate white meat (with a section of dark) and a wonderfully neutral sardine flavor that pairs well with a dash of Tabasco and a Saltine.

Even better than their flavor is the visual impact of their sleek, fat, glistening, silver-sided bodies packed end to end in their palm-sized, aluminum, pull-top can which neatly evokes the turn-key steel sardine cans of my childhood. It's a picture almost too pure to sully with a fork or knife, luckily that ephemeral beauty remains up until the last body is pulled from the can and laid out upon its cracker and finally consumed with respectful appreciation. Heaven.

ProfileName: Food and Wine Maven "foodandwinemavens dot com"
Summary: Best sardines I've found, even compared to gourmet stores
Text: I adore sardines and have tried them all... at Trader Joe's (the worst! so dry and flavorless!), at Whole Foods, at local gourmet shops, imported from all parts of the world. These are succulent with the perfect, rich flavor. Even my baby (less than 1 yr old) loves to eat these (I wish I could give her more but they have added salt). If you want the best, these are the best. Don't even bother with the other King Oscar sardines.

Summary: Lightly smokey, not too salty - perfect for a sandwich
Text:
These sardines really stand out as the best national brand. I like them because they are always found in perfect condition in the can, with their silvery skins sparkling, and heads and tails neatly trimmed away. The flavor is delicate, lightly smokey and not too salty. Though oilier than sardines packed in other sauces, rest assured that these contain pure olive oil and the natural fats of the fishes, which make them a good source of heart-healthy omega-3. Drained of oil, they are roughly 150 calories per can. The ingredients are simple: Sardines, olive oil, and salt.

How to eat them?

Well, they are excellent right out of the can! Most of the time, I decant them for draining and make an open-faced sandwich. They are very good on toasted Fisherman's Warf type sourdough bread, lightly spread with mayo, sweet pickle relish, and a dash or two of Tobasco. The result is a nice midnight snack which never upsets the stomach.

Finally, given the long shelf life, these cans of tiny fish would make a good addition to an emergency food supply. At any given time, I've got a dozen or so (one case) stashed away, and I rotate them along with my other necessities.
The sardines came in about 3 days and are fantastic. I'll never buy any other kind. Tiny Tots are the best. Cross Packs are right up there too but hard to find.

I've tried too many sardines to count and these are the very best you can buy. Don't waste time, energy and money on others unless you want to really appreciate how good these tender tasty Tiny Tots really are, as they marinade in that wonderfully thick extra virgin olive oil. I hope these things are in heaven if I manage to make it there. My second choice to these would be a beef tenderloin smoke grilled slowly over wood chipped charcoal.

These are still the best sardines in the market - can't find them locally in any stores - so get them by the case at Amazon.
These will make a sardine lover out of anyone!

These are advertised as tiny sardines (tiny tots) but they are almost exactly the same size as the King Oscar double layer sardines in the red label. I have taken a photo of one of each can, opened next to each other. You can hardly tell the difference. Why should I pay so much more for sardines that aren't any smaller or different tasting? Very disappointing.

I really didn't like these. They were mushy, not very flavorful and too oily. Tails left on a couple were kind of unpalatable. I found the Chicken of the Sea single layer smoked in soy oil to be firm and nice and smoky, albeit a tad salty. Better price too.
It does not seem to be as strong a seasoning enhancer as other MSG products that I have bought.
I found this to be a super value!  I wouldn't think of shopping anywhere else for my spices.  VERY happy customer!
Couldn't find MSG anywhere.  It's more of a gag gift, but sweet baby it's MSG!!

Blue Buffalo Canned Dog Food, Beef Sirloin is good stuff! We mix in a quarter of the can with some dry dog food (Blue Buffalo Adult Dog Dry Food, Chicken and Rice Recipe, 30-Pound Bag and our dog loves it. Because we get four meals out of a can, this is a pretty good value. The chicken flavored wet food is pretty good too.

Summary: dogs like it, good for them, too!
Text: Glad to say nice things about a healthy canned dog food my dogs actually enjoy (many of them are not to their taste.)  And Amazon makes it easy to obtain.  A great purchase.

My dog is a "no kill " shelter rescue. I tried every brand of holistic type canned and dry food, and he was totally uninterested.
He would only eat the least expensive canned food from the super market.
After reading revues I was informed to find it was the least nutritious available. "So your child likes candy, but you don't feed candy 3 times a day." These were the words that sent me to Blue Buffalo.

I am not sure what has changed about this food, but my poor dog has been nothing but sick on this food, and she used to do well on it. I have noticed whenever I feed it to her, her stomach growls, she gets sick, and then she has uncontrollable diarrhea. I would not recommend it, get a better food. After I started looking around, it sounds like this food has caused a lot of illness and sometimes deaths in dogs.

Summary: Blue Diamond Premier Dog Food is loved by my dog
Text: This is great dog food.  My dog is very fussy about food and will usually only eat meat that I eat.  I had to find a high in nutrition dog food that was not full of fillers and corn meal etc.  This is the food your looking for.  It probably is the best on the market and my dog deserves only the best.  We humans wouldn't eat something that we didn't like and we are smart enough to know what is good for our bodies.  So we treat our pets the same.  We use to feed our pets Science Diet but have decided to upgrade to be a better dog food that he likes to eat.  I think it has much better flavor so my dog eats it.  Yes it is costs more but well worth the added 15 dollars per month cost.
We keep telling Mom to quit trying other brands!  This is the tastiest canned food ever.  We feel sorry for the dogs whose owners only feed them grocery store dog food. signed, two happy terriers

I've left plenty of raving reviews for the different types of Blue canned food and I feel a little repetitive but for us and our dogs there really is no other brand that even compares! Between all four large German shepherds, Blue food and a raw diet are perfect for us! We have been nothing but pleased with this food so for us there is no other choice!

Although my dog(schnauzer) is a picky eater, she likes the Blue Buffalo dry food (lamb/rice and chicken/rice).  I have tried both the turkey dinner and beef dinner, and neither is very appealing to the dog.  I have been forced to give away the remaining cans I bought (not inexpensive) to others to see if dogs would eat them.  Not at all impressed with Blue Buffalo canned foods.

My husband uses this on his popcorn, (along with chile powder, tomato powder, cayenne pepper, chili/garlic flavor flax seed oil and cumin). The effect is something like "Chili Lime Tostios". Pretty good stuff if I do say so myself. But we buy Twang only because we can no longer find his favorite at Whole Foods anymore [...]

I love the product I recieved. I got hooked on Twang in Texas and now that I live in Florida-where they don't sell it anywhere- I will probably be buying it every couple of months. The package was secure and got here on exactly the day the invoice said I would recieve it. Great job!

Summary: Great Food at a Great Price!!
Text: I have been feeding this food for a few weeks now to my four dogs.  They are all doing very well on.  It is very palatable and highly digestible.  I would recommend this food.  It's definitely worth trying!

I have a 4 year old Boston Terrier who recently seemed to develop food allergies. I bought this food hoping it would help with her itching (which was in turn causing her to lose hair) and it really did help! She loved the stuff! I was dreading having to buy my dog 40 dollar bags of dog food. I love her to death but with a baby on the way I feel there are more important things to spend that money on but this dog food seems to have quality ingredients at a good price. The fact that it's American made was also something I really liked.

I really hate to write a review in fear of Hi-Tek boosting their affordable prices on their dog food. My dog loves this food, no issues, and even has stinky firm stools to prove it. The ingredients are great; for what you buy and get in return is unmatched in my opinion. My dog has tried Hi-Tek's grain free, too, and she's very satisfied with that line as well. I'll be buying and recommending Hi-Tek for as long as their around.

My dogs (all four of them) love this food...even my 13-year old Pomeranian who gave up hard kibble a couple of years ago will munch at the bowl every now and again. Thank you for making a product that my dogs love and I feel good about feeding it to them :)
My dogs enjoy this high quality food. Read about the ingredients, they are the best! No digestive problems, happy healthy dogs. A good price too.
The product is great, but due to the price doubling, will not be purchasing anymore.  Very unfortunate situation.  My dogs did very well on this food.

This flavour is definitely a TOP favourite among the deployed troops. Never mind that there is no image available for this product. All the people who had a chance to savour this item have indicated that they would like more! Highly recommended.

Summary: 5 Stars. As Expected if You've Ever Tried Maruchan.
Text: These are as expected from previously eating them. Great price when on sale.  Shipped fast, long shelf life. Good to keep in case of zombie apocalypse.

Another good one from Maruchan!  These things are easy as heck to prepare, just microwave a cup of water to boiling and pour.  Five minutes later, you have a quickie lunch.  It's an American company with American workers, that's a bonus!

fast delivery, cheap, convenient

ok so its the best tasting and contains a sht ton of salt, but i still love it. lol

I purchased two packages of these twist chews. They arrived quickly and were exactly what I wanted, but both packages had ants in them. After knocking off all (hopefully) the ants, I repacked the chews in plastic bags and stored them in the freezer to kill any critters I missed. The dogs ate them over time and had no bad effects, so I don't think the product was unsafe. It was just a creepy experience!

The candy was as described and just as I remembered it as a kid.  I normally get the atomic fireballs.  I have been eating those for years.  The only issue I had was the $8 for shipping them.  I figured that meant they would be shipped in a good box and secured.  I ended up getting them shipped in a bag with no packing or anything.  They were shoved in my mailbox and at least 10% of them were crushed or damaged somehow.  For $8 I really expected the shipping to be first rate.  Do yourself a favor and do not order anything from anyone unless it is shipped directly from amazon.
I buy these bunnies every Easter for my husband and my father. They LOVE them. A bit expensive for chocolate but for once a year it's a nice splurge!
The chocolate was as good as we expected.  Preferring darker nutrition dense and flavorfull foods, this met our expectations.  We will purchase other products from this company as we have need.

Shame on me for not knowing what I was buying by not being sure how much the ounces were, but shame on the person for selling the bag of chips for that much money. I will never purchase anything from amazon again.

A couple of months agoe I was looking for Dynasty Mustard Powder and had no luck locally, so I searched Amazon and found it. I was thrilled and ordered (the minimum order of 12) online. I gave away several bottles to neighbor's never noticing the expiration date. Last week I used my first bottle for a dressing I like and it tasted very bland but didn' know why. I tried remaking it a day agoe and again, bland. I decided to check all the dates on the ingrediantes and found the exp. date on the mustard is July 15,2011. I noticed on my last old bottle I had, it was 3 years to expiration (but there is only a teaspoon left). I was so upset that they would send me an item (12 bottles) that would be out of date in two months!
These pistachios are awesome.  They are delicious, naturally opened with minimal closed shells (almost none).  I'm very happy with this purchase and will reorder.  I recommend very highly!

I'd like to make it clear that I really like pistachios. I eat a lot of this particular nut but these Setton Farms pistachios were beyond bad. There was a large percentage of nuts which were hard as rocks. The nuts which I could actually bite into tasted rotten. Also there were more empty shells than in any purchase I have ever made. I decided to check the expiration date and found that the date is not printed on the bag, but instead is on a stick on label. I carefully peeled back the label and discovered parts of other labels beneath. Imagine that?! No wonder these were totally inedible. I returned them for a refund. If anyone has any suggestions for good quality pistachios, please let me know.

We just finished off our first bag of Setton Farms Premium California Dry Roasted with Sea Salt Pistachios.  I really like pistachios and have had many other brands, but can tell you that these are really the best I have had. They were very easy to open, fresh, and had a wonderful, flavorful taste. I will most definitely buy them again.

I received this bag broken, the pistachios were all over the box, I contacted amazon to return them to get a refund to then order them again, but since I left them open in our kitchen table my partner came and started eating them, by the time I noticed she had about a cup of them so I felt I couldn't return them. The box was in good condition so the damage was not in transit, I am not sure how the bag was so broken but the only explanation was that it happened while they packed them. On another note, my partmner didn't get sick from eating them but we didn't want to take a bigger chance. I do like this brand since I ordered the smaller bag before and that is why we decided to get the bigger one.
These are nacho plain old pistachios--these are deluxe nuts. Not too salty, large, plump, and flavorful--they are simply the best.

You've seen the commercials for a product and he just says "Tasty", well that is exactly what these pistachios are. And they are half the price that I can purchase from the local stores. Second time I have ordered and will be ordering more in the near future.Setton Farms Premium Pistachios Roasted Salted - 1 Pound

This sauce is for those who love high heat and flavor to their favorite dishes, so it's not intended for the casual hot sauce lover who is not acquainted with the strong spice just yet. The heat on this product is very high, even a small amount that will leave your mouth and tongue burning several seconds after consumption.

Personally, I like this sauce and the heat lingers for a while and goes great on sandwiches, in chili, salsa and other things you want to add an intense kick to.

Recommended for the hot sauce enthusiasts.
Have ordered from them before.... Nice company to work with and always friendly on the phone. They will even give discounts if you order more then one thing.
My kitty is very fussy and has UTI issues. This is a really good product for UTI issues and he actually likes it.

Summary: Nice to have safe hot cereal again.
Text: My teen age daughters were disappointed not to be able to have oatmeal at the fast food place before school with their friends so we bought Eco-planet hot cereal packets for them to take along. It worked! They were really pleased with the flavor and the texture. It's hard to find where we live and the price is higher than I'd like to pay but it was safe, easy and good for them so I'll try to keep it in our kitchen for them.

These giant gummy bears are horrendous! They taste like ****! They smell just as bad! Note in the picture that the blue raspberry bear is GREEN! I only made it a couple of bites into my blue raspberry one. My husband thought it was awful too.

Although my kids love the giant gummy bears there could be a better assortment of flavors when they ship. We tend to get more of one flavor and not enough of the others. Cherry, Green Apple and Grape seem to be the most popular with my kids and we tend to get more blue raspberry and orange....

Enjoyed, I bought using a kindle special offer and really became a fan of this tea. It brews a deep rich red, the mix reminds me of the English Christmas wassail but with more smoothness which comes from vanilla I think. Very nice for a cold and tastes wonderful esp. because their ingredients are so fresh.

I bought a package of these tasty little snacks to keep in my desk for when those pesky afternoon hunger pangs hit. It was supposed to keep me from buying the sugary crap in the vending machines. Little did i know that they would quickly become an addiction for the entire office - from the CEO to the receptionist. I am re-ordering 2 packs this time - 1 for them and 1 just for me!

Summary: Neither spicy (hot or otherwise), nor beefy or meaty (in traditional sense)
Text:
This product is NOT beef jerky or anything remotely like it. This product is neither spicy, nor beefy or meaty.

What this product amounts to is a sour, salty, mushy, meat-based concoction pressed into stick form.

And the ingredients*, to whom it may concern, are troubling to say the least.

I'm currently inquiring in my social network about anyone with a dog who should like to have it. ('Who' may refer to the dog as well.)

*Ingredients: Beef, Beef Hearts, Water, Soy Protein Concentrate, Salt, Dextrose, Spices, Corn Syrup, Smoke Flavoring, Paprika, Monosodium Glutamate, Flavoring, Sodium Erythorbate, Lactic Acid Starter Culture, Sodium Nitrite. (Appetizing, ahem.)

Summary: Nothing I have ever tasted before
Text: I have to say I am a beef jerky lover, I have tried many brands and makes of jerky and really have not found one I didn't like... until now. These beef sticks are not too spicy but have an odd taste to them, not sure what it is but one friend described is as a smokey twang. I have to agree, its an odd taste that is just not good, followed by a smokey cover up. I bought these to take to a boating party out at the lake because they looked like a good snack food, turned out I could not even give them away at the end of the day.

i got these in the mail the other day and they are horrible. it is like they took Pink slime and seasoned it and piped it into thin plastic.
i am very disappointed :-(. these are a step above a dog treat. i hate to leave a negative review, but 30+ dollars with shipping. I brought this bag into work and put them in my Drivers room......they are still there. usually ANY food left on there table is gone. \

http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B000FYVKRS/ref=cm_cr_rev_prod_title

These are not very good. The taste is similar to slimjims but they're not as tasty. The texture is a little off too. A little mealy. If the taste was better or the texture was more appetizing they would have gotten a better review from me.

I finally received my order of  buffalo bills  hot shot Hot flavor 2.1 lbs. I bought this because of all the review. My first thought about the taste of this beef stick is that it tasted really sour and i tasted some spices but it was far from hot,it wasn't even hot at all. Its easy to chew probably because it tasted too mushy and soft. The reason why i gave it a 2 star instead of 1 star is because it's was going for a good price. Overall, I wouldn't buy this beef stick because it taste mushy and sour, I'm sure it's not expired because  it says feb 2013. I knew i should've gotten the peperoni flavor beef sticks. Also, from all the other people's review i was expecting a sample from them since i read a lot of people received samples. I was kinda disappointed. So i won't be buying the hot shots again and its not because i didn't receieve a sample. haha

These lil pepperoni sticks go quick for they taste great! Bet ya can't eat just one!
Choo Choo R Snacks has the best customer service I have ever had the pleasure in dealing with also!
thick skin has more substance than the mush inside; called pepperoni but who knows why; so maybe try cut up in soup as last chance, or just for the animals

I love jerky, and try most new brands I come across. Now and then I get a yen for beef sticks too, and here we are...

Good points-- I agree that these are much less greasy than Slim Jims. The consistency of the filler is also much better.
They came very quickly.

Not so good points-- One review described them as 'spicy'. To me, 'spicy' adds twang while you're chewing. 'Hot' hangs around in your mouth after you've swallowed. These are 'hot'. They're not blisteringly hot; I'd go for maybe 4 or 5 on a 10 scale, but I wanted 'spicy' not 'hot'.
They mostly just taste like some, uh... unique kind of liquid smoke. They almost taste like meat, but not quite.

They're ok. I don't hate 'em, but doubt I'll repeat this particular experiment.

I wanted to try these out because of the price and because it seemed to have solid reviews. I really like Slim Jims, and this looked similar and had good reviews.

I didn't notice any mushiness that some people claimed. I thought it had a good snap to it, although you can definitely see where the casing is and the rest of the product, and sometimes it will just slide out a bit.

I like the packaging. You can stick these into a big slider ziplock bag and it makes it far more convenient than any individually wrapped product, like Slim Jims are. I don't know how well it will keep that way, but I think it should be fine because, well, these products are pretty much designed to be kept like that. I don't know why some companies individually wrap theirs, maybe someone else can chime in on that.

And now for the negative. Originally I tried to be more diplomatic with it, because I didn't want to dock stars for it not tasting like a Slim Jim. My brother absolutely hated the sticks and considers them disgusting. I held out that they weren't that bad, but after forcing myself to eat them the last few days I now give up.

But worse is the ingredients. These things pack MSG. There is no nutritional label so we don't even know the percentage of it. But it is listed as an ingredient. Now it depends on you if that is a problem or not, for me personally I want to avoid MSG so this product doesn't work for me.

I will likely throw away the rest of what I have. It is better to go for regular jerky, which can actually be healthy. These sticks are however a different product that you have to look at carefully, and for me the taste just isn't good enough to justify eating them.
If you like the savory taste of beef hearts, you won't be disappointed by this product. Delicious beef heart flavor in every bite.

Summary: So good I got a boner :P (please don't tell anyone)
Text: Quality is sexexcellent, not excellent, but sexexcellent! Everything comes neatly packaged and they even give you free samples to try out. You can never go wrong. They are delish. As for these "Short Shots" they aren't really hot in my opinion, but they taste damn good and aren't 70% grease like Slim Jim (don't get me wrong, I love Slim Jim, but too greasy). You won't regret it, they are really, really good. This is my second time I've ordered and I've been more than satisfied with the quality.

These are tasty, but I'm not thrilled with the MSG and corn syrup. C'mon guys - nobody wants MSG in their food these days. Drop that junk. I knocked off 2 stars just for the lousy ingredients which may keep me from ordering these again. But again, these are tasty.

I'm adding a star to this review not for the product itself, but for the company selling them. When they saw the mediocre review, they immediately offered a refund or to try something else. You can't find better customer service.
What they don't tell you: The first three ingredients are:  Beef, Beef Hearts, Water.  They also include Monosoldium glutamate (MSG) and corn syrup.  I wish I had known what was in these.

Summary: very similar to Slim Jim's,  THE VENDOR IS GREAT COMPANY
Text:
Buffalo Bills Premium Snacks

I realize that taste is an individual thing, but I thought I'd share my thoughts on these products.

First, customer service is excellent. I've always gotten exactly what I ordered in a very timely manner.

So far I've ordered the following products:

1) Buffalo Bills 2.1lbs Mild Short Shots

2) Buffalo Bills 2.1lbs Hot Short Shots

The first two short shots are very similar to Slim Jim's, just not individually wrapped, I just put them in a zip lock bag and find them very convenient to munch on( about a quarter pound per zip lock bag.

3) Buffalo Bills 1.2lb Extra Smokeys
These are very smokey, but a little too dry for my taste.

4) Buffalo Bills 16oz Premium Hickory Beef Jerky Pieces (random size
Taste great if you are a jerky lover.

5) Buffalo Bills 2.1lb Pepperoni Short Shots
Probably the closest to Slim Jim's of all the short shots
